1406.en: <voice 00570_00001406><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>You just got unlucky...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1406.ja: <voice 00570_00001406><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あんた　運がなかったなあ……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1406.ko: <voice 00570_00001406><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 댁도 참 운이 없구만…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1406.zh-Hans: <voice 00570_00001406><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你运气真差啊……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1406.zh-Hant: <voice 00570_00001406><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你運氣真差……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1407.en:
<voice 00890_00001407><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>And you were so young, too.
Poor thing... What a tragedy.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1407.ja:
<voice 00890_00001407><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「まだ　若いっていうのに。
　かわいそうに……かわいそうになあ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1407.ko:
<voice 00890_00001407><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 아직 나이도 어린데.
　쯧쯧…… 정말 안됐어.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1407.zh-Hans:
<voice 00890_00001407><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>明明还这么年轻。
真是可怜……太可怜了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1407.zh-Hant:
<voice 00890_00001407><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>明明還這麼年輕。
真是可憐……太可憐了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1408.en:
<voice 00950_00001408><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I'll return your body to your hometown.
It's the least I can do.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1408.ja:
<voice 00950_00001408><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「せめて　あたしが　あんたのなきがらを
　故郷にまで　連れて帰ってあげるからね。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1408.ko:
<voice 00950_00001408><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 내가 당신 시신만은
　꼭 고향으로 데려다줄 테니 걱정 마.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1408.zh-Hans:
<voice 00950_00001408><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>我会将你的遗体
送回故乡的。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1408.zh-Hant:
<voice 00950_00001408><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>我會將你的遺體
送回故鄉的。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1409.en:
<voice 01535_00001409><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Whoa! This road's awful as ever.
The carriage'll break down at this rate.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1409.ja:
<voice 01535_00001409><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「うわっ！　相変わらず　ひどい道だなあ。
　これじゃあ　馬車が壊れちまうよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1409.ko:
<voice 01535_00001409><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 윽! 여전히 길이 엉망이구만.
　이러다 마차가 망가지겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1409.zh-Hans:
<voice 01535_00001409><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>哇！这条路还是像往常那么难走啊。
这样下去马车会被颠坏的。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1409.zh-Hant:
<voice 01535_00001409><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>唔哇！這條路還是一樣那麼難走。
這樣下去馬車會壞掉的。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1410.en:
<voice 01915_00001410><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Look, there it is.
Your hometown of, uh, Kuppuku... Puku...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1410.ja:
<voice 01915_00001410><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ほら　見えてきたよ。
　あんたの故郷　プッ　プク……
　プクッ…………！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1410.ko:
<voice 01915_00001410><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 봐, 이제 보이는구만.
　그쪽 고향인 푸, 푸크……
　푸크…………!<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1410.zh-Hans:
<voice 01915_00001410><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你瞧，快到了啊。
你的故乡，普……普库……
普库…………<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1410.zh-Hant:
<voice 01915_00001410><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你瞧，快到了喔。
你的故鄉，普……普庫……
普庫…………！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1411.ja: <voice 02000_00001411><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「……プクレットの村だよっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1411.zh-Hans: <voice 02000_00001411><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>……普库莱特村！！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1411.zh-Hant: <voice 02000_00001411><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>……普庫萊特村啦！！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1412.ja: <voice 02330_00001412><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ぎゃーーーーーーっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1412.zh-Hans: <voice 02330_00001412><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>呀啊啊啊啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1413.en:
<voice 00770_00001413><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>How strange...
I could have sworn they were dead.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1413.ja:
<voice 00770_00001413><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「おっかしいなあー。
　この人　確かに死んでたんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1413.ko:
<voice 00770_00001413><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 그거참 이상하네.
　분명히 죽었었다니까요.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1413.zh-Hans:
<voice 00770_00001413><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>太奇怪了。
这个人之前明明已经死了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1413.zh-Hant:
<voice 00770_00001413><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>太奇怪了──
這個人確實已經死了啊。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1414.en:
<voice 00830_00001414><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>Oh, give me a break, Mr. Tiltzkin.
<pc>'s clearly just fine.<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1414.ja:
<voice 00830_00001414><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>「やだなあ　ティルツキンさん。
　<pc>は　ちゃーんと生きてるじゃん。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1414.ko:
<voice 00830_00001414><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>: 틸츠킨 씨도 참.
　{pc}|hpp(은,는) 멀쩡히 살아 있잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1414.zh-Hans:
<voice 00830_00001414><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>你说什么呢，提尔茨津。
<pc>明明活得好好的。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1414.zh-Hant:
<voice 00830_00001414><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>你說什麼啊，提爾茲金。
<pc>明明活得好好的。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1415.en:
<voice 00920_00001415><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>But get this! When I found
them, their heart had stopped, and
they weren't even breathing...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1415.ja:
<voice 00920_00001415><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「でもね。あたしが　<pc>さんを
　見つけた時は　心臓は止まってたし
　息も　してなかった……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1415.ko:
<voice 00920_00001415><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 하지만 제가 <pc> 씨를
　발견했을 땐 심장도 안 뛰고
　숨도 안 쉬었다고요…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1415.zh-Hans:
<voice 00920_00001415><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>可是我发现<pc>时，
已经没有心跳和呼吸了啊……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1415.zh-Hant:
<voice 00920_00001415><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>可是，當我發現<pc>時，
不僅心臟已經停止跳動，
甚至連呼吸都沒了……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1416.en:
<voice 01060_00001416><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Anyone who saw would have agreed!
They were dead as a doornail,
so how come they're alive again?!<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1416.ja:
<voice 01060_00001416><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ありゃあ　誰が見たって　死んでました。
　この上なく　カンペキに死んでたのに
　なんで　生きてるんですか！？<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1416.ko:
<voice 01060_00001416><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 모로 보나 죽은 사람이었어요.
　두말할 나위 없이, 완벽히요.
　대체 왜 살아 있는 겁니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1416.zh-Hans:
<voice 01060_00001416><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>怎么看都已经死掉了啊。
明明都死透了，
为什么还会活过来啊？！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1416.zh-Hant:
<voice 01060_00001416><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>怎麼看都已經死掉了啊。
明明都死透了，
為什麼還會活著啊！？<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1417.en:
<voice 01239_00001417><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>Ahaha! You got tricked! Maybe you
haven't heard, Mr. Tiltzkin, but
<pc>'s the best actor in the village!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1417.ja:
<voice 01239_00001417><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>「あはは。まんまと　だまされたね！
　ティルツキンさんは　知らないだろうけど
　<pc>は　この村　いちばんの役者だよ。<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1417.ko:
<voice 01239_00001417><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>: 아하하, 감쪽같이 속았네!
　틸츠킨 씨는 모르겠지만
　{pc}|hpp(은,는) 우리 마을 최고의 배우거든.<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1417.zh-Hans:
<voice 01239_00001417><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>啊哈哈。你彻底被骗了吧！
提尔茨津你可能不清楚，
<pc>可是这个村子里最厉害的演员呢。<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1417.zh-Hant:
<voice 01239_00001417><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>啊哈哈。你徹底被騙了吧！
提爾茲金你可能不清楚，
<pc>可是這個村子裡最厲害的演員呢。<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26924.en:
<voice 01289_00026924><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>It's easy to pretend to be dead
just to get some attention!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26924.ja:
<voice 01289_00026924><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>「ウケるためだったら　死んだフリくらい
　かんたんに　できちゃうのさ！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26924.ko:
<voice 01289_00026924><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>: 웃기기 위해서라면 죽은 척쯤은
　얼마든지 할 녀석이야!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26924.zh-Hans:
<voice 01289_00026924><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>为了搞笑，装死什么的
根本是小菜一碟！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
26924.zh-Hant:
<voice 01289_00026924><start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>為了搞笑，裝死什麼的
根本是小菜一碟！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1418.en:
<voice 01360_00001418><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>But wasn't your 'revival' a little 
too early, <pc>? You'd have had a bigger
audience if you waited til you got back to the village.<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1418.ja:
<voice 01360_00001418><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>「けど　<pc>。生き返るタイミングが
　ちょっと　早かったんじゃないか？
　村に着いてからのが　ギャラリーが多いだろ。<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1418.ko:
<voice 01360_00001418><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>: 그런데 <pc>, 살아나는 타이밍이
　조금 일렀던 거 아냐?
　마을에서 깨어나는 게 구경꾼도 더 많잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1418.zh-Hans:
<voice 01360_00001418><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>不过<pc>啊，你复活得有点太早了吧？
等回到村子里面再复活的话，
观众会更多啊。<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1418.zh-Hant:
<voice 01360_00001418><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>不過<pc>，你復活得也太早了吧？
要是等回到村子裡再復活，
觀眾不是會更多。<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1419.en:
<voice 01500_00001419><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>Relax. Keep in mind, they were playing
dead in a spooky place with monsters all
around, waiting for someone to come by.<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1419.ja:
<voice 01500_00001419><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>「まあまあ。魔物がうろつく　恐ろしい場所で
　誰かが　通りかかるまで
　ずっと　死んだフリを　してたんだし。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1419.ko:
<voice 01500_00001419><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>: 에이, 마물이 어슬렁대는 무시무시한 곳에서
　사람이 지나갈 때까지
　계속 죽은 척하고 있었던 거잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1419.zh-Hans:
<voice 01500_00001419><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>不过算啦。能够在怪物出没的恐怖地带
一直装死等着有人路过，
已经很不容易啦。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1419.zh-Hant:
<voice 01500_00001419><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>不過，能在怪物出沒的恐怖地帶
一直裝死等著有人路過
也很不容易啦。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1420.en:
<voice 01590_00001420><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>They got Tiltzkin good, and
that's all that matters.<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1420.ja:
<voice 01590_00001420><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>「ティルツキンさんには　ウケたんだから
　それで　いいじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1420.ko:
<voice 01590_00001420><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>: 게다가 틸츠킨 씨를 놀라게 하는 데는
　성공했으니 그럼 된 거 아냐?<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1420.zh-Hans:
<voice 01590_00001420><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>能把提尔茨津吓一大跳，
已经很不错啦。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1420.zh-Hant:
<voice 01590_00001420><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>能把提爾茲金嚇一大跳，
已經很不錯啦。<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1421.en:
<voice 01660_00001421><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>That's true. Plus, doing their act in the
village wouldn't be nearly as impressive as
pulling it off in a place full of monsters.<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1421.ja:
<voice 01660_00001421><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>「まあなー。村の中なら　ともかく
　魔物が出る場所を　選ぶあたりが
　<pc>の　すごいところだよな。<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1421.ko:
<voice 01660_00001421><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>: 하긴, 마을 안이면 몰라도
　마물이 출몰하는 곳에서 그런 짓을 벌이는 게
　<pc>의 놀라운 점이지.<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1421.zh-Hans:
<voice 01660_00001421><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>也是啊。在村里也就算了，
竟然敢选择在怪物出没的地方装死，
<pc>果然很厉害啊。<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1421.zh-Hant:
<voice 01660_00001421><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>也是啊。在村裡也就算了，
竟然敢選擇在怪物出沒的地方裝死，
<pc>果然很厲害啊。<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1422.en:
<voice 01780_00001422><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Playing dead, huh...?
To me, it'd almost seemed like
another soul had entered their body...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1422.ja:
<voice 01780_00001422><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「死んだフリねえ……。
　あたしには　死体に突然
　別の魂が宿ったようにも　思えましたが……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1422.ko:
<voice 01780_00001422><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 죽은 척이라…….
　제게는 시체에 다른 영혼이
　들어간 것처럼 보였습니다만…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1422.zh-Hans:
<voice 01780_00001422><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>装死啊……
在我看来倒像是别的灵魂
附到了尸体上一样……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1422.zh-Hant:
<voice 01780_00001422><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>裝死啊……
在我看來倒像是別的靈魂
突然附到了屍體上一樣……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1423.en:
<voice 01910_00001423><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I really do admire the dedication the
Pukulipo people have for their arts.
Oh-ho-ho...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1423.ja:
<voice 01910_00001423><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ともかく　プクリポの皆さんの
　芸にかける根性には
　つくづく　おそれいります。とほほ……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1423.ko:
<voice 01910_00001423><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 아무튼 푸크리포 분들의
　개그를 향한 열정은
　정말 감탄스럽기 그지없군요. 에고고…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1423.zh-Hans:
<voice 01910_00001423><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>总之，普库里坡族的各位
对于表演如此执着，
真是让我大开眼界了。哈哈……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1423.zh-Hant:
<voice 01910_00001423><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>總之，普庫里坡族的各位
對於表演如此執著，
真是讓我大開眼界了，唉唉……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1424.en:
<voice 02230_00001424><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Well, I have some business to attend
to, so I'll see myself out.
I'll be sure to come back soon!<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1424.ja:
<voice 02230_00001424><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「それじゃ　あたしは　商売がありますんで
　このへんで　失礼しますよ。
　では　皆さん　また来ますね！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1424.ko:
<voice 02230_00001424><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 그럼 전 장사를 하러 가야 하니
　이만 실례하겠습니다.
　여러분, 다음에 또 들르겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1424.zh-Hans:
<voice 02230_00001424><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>那么，我还要继续去做生意，
就先走一步了。
再见了各位，我会再来的！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1424.zh-Hant:
<voice 02230_00001424><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>那麼，我還要繼續去做生意，
就先走一步了。
再見了各位，我會再來的！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1425.en:
<voice 02700_00001425><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>What a riot!
Did you see the look on his face?!
Good going, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1425.ja:
<voice 02700_00001425><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>「あー　面白かった！
　ティルツキンさんの　あの顔ってば！
　おつかれっ　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1425.ko:
<voice 02700_00001425><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>: 아~ 재밌었다!
　틸츠킨 씨의 그 기겁한 얼굴이라니!
　고생 많았어, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1425.zh-Hans:
<voice 02700_00001425><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>哈哈，真有意思！
提尔茨津的表情那么惊讶！
辛苦你了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1425.zh-Hant:
<voice 02700_00001425><start_lip_sync n00304 _normal m00001>啊──真有意思！
瞧瞧提爾茲金那驚訝的表情！
真是辛苦你了，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00304 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1426.ja: <voice 02775_00001426><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>「それじゃあな　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1426.ko: <voice 02775_00001426><start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>: 그럼 다음에 봐, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1427.en:
<voice 00034_00001427><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>I heard, <pc>! You're
finally ready to get out there make
your mark on the world, aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1427.ja:
<voice 00034_00001427><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「聞いたぜ聞いたぜ！　<pc>！
　とうとう　世界に　はばたくんだな！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1427.ko:
<voice 00034_00001427><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 얘기 들었어! <pc>!
　드디어 세계로 진출하는 거구나!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1427.zh-Hans:
<voice 00034_00001427><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我听说了啊！<pc>！
你总算要走向世界了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1427.zh-Hant:
<voice 00034_00001427><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我都聽說了喔！<pc>！
你總算要走向世界了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1429.en:
<voice 00064_00001429><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>You said it yourself. You told me you'd wrap
up your unfinished business here
then set off for the big city to test your skills.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1429.ja:
<voice 00064_00001429><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「ほら　お前　言ってたじゃないか。
　プクレットの村で　やり残したことをやったら
　都会へ出て　自分のチカラを試すんだって。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1429.ko:
<voice 00064_00001429><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 왜, 네가 전에 그랬잖아.
　푸크레트 마을에서 남은 일을 끝내면
　도시로 떠나 네 능력을 시험해 보겠다고.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1429.zh-Hans:
<voice 00064_00001429><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你不是说过吗？
等结束了在普库莱特村要做的事情，
就出发去大城市试炼自己。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1429.zh-Hant:
<voice 00064_00001429><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你不是說過嗎？
等結束了在普庫萊特村要做的事情，
就出發去大城市考驗自己。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1430.en:
<voice 00094_00001430><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>So spooking Mr. Tiltzkin was
your unfinished business, eh?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1430.ja:
<voice 00094_00001430><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「ティルツキンさんを　ドッキリで
　おどろかす……ってのが
　その　やり残したことなんだろ？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1430.ko:
<voice 00094_00001430><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 죽은 척해서
　틸츠킨 씨를 놀라게 하는 게
　네가 말한 남은 일이었던 거지?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1430.zh-Hans:
<voice 00094_00001430><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你说的要做的事情，
就是让提尔茨津大吃一惊吧？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1430.zh-Hant:
<voice 00094_00001430><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你說的要做的事情……
就是讓提爾茲金
大吃一驚吧？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1431.en:
...Huh, I'm wrong? What is it, then? You're not having second
thoughts about leaving a hick town like this, are you?
1431.ja:
<voice 00144_00001431><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……えっ　ちがうの？
　じゃあ　他に　何がしたかったんだ？
　もう　こんな田舎の村に　未練はないだろ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1431.ko:
<voice 00144_00001431><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……어? 아냐?
　그럼 뭐가 하고 싶었던 거야?
　이제 이런 촌구석에 미련은 없을 거 아냐.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1431.zh-Hans:
<voice 00144_00001431><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……咦，不是吗？
那还有什么别的事情吗？你对这种乡下村子
应该没有什么好留恋的了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1431.zh-Hant:
<voice 00144_00001431><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……咦，不是嗎？
那還有什麼別的事情嗎？你對這種鄉下村子
應該沒什麼好留戀的吧。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1432.en:
<voice 00223_00001432><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>When people think of
<pc> of Pukulet Village...<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1432.ja: <voice 00223_00001432><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「プクレットの村の　<pc>といえば……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1432.ko: <voice 00223_00001432><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 푸크레트 마을의 <pc> 하면……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1432.zh-Hans: <voice 00223_00001432><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>说到普库莱特村的<pc>……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1432.zh-Hant: <voice 00223_00001432><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>說到普庫萊特村的<pc>……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1433.en:
<voice 00253_00001433><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>They think of the legendary
Pukulipo who won the Goofball Grand
Prix to decide the funniest person in Pukulet three years in a row.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1433.ja:
<voice 00253_00001433><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「プクレットの村で　最強の　面白野郎を決める
　演芸グランプリで　３回連続優勝した
　伝説のプクリポだって　みんな知ってるぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1433.ko:
<voice 00253_00001433><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 푸크레트 마을 최고의 익살꾼을 가리는
　연예 그랑프리에서 3번 연속 우승한
　전설의 푸크리포란 건 이미 모두가 다 안다고.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1433.zh-Hans:
<voice 00253_00001433><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>谁不知道你就是传说中的那个
在普库莱特村决出最搞笑者的演艺大奖赛中
获得三连胜的普库里坡啊。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1433.zh-Hant:
<voice 00253_00001433><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>就是那個傳說中連續３次在普庫萊特村
選出最強搞笑者的演藝大賽中拿下冠軍的普庫里坡，
這大家都知道喔。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1434.en:
<voice 00353_00001434><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>As your former partner, I can
confidentlysay that you're ready for
the big city. So go make your mark as the funniest Pukulipo around!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1434.ja:
<voice 00353_00001434><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「もと相方のオレが　保証する。
　今の　お前なら　都会でも通用するさ。
　面白プクリポとして　世界に　はばたく時だ！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1434.ko:
<voice 00353_00001434><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 예전 파트너인 내가 장담하는데
　지금의 너라면 도시에서도 먹힐 거야.
　웃음꾼 푸크리포로 세상에 이름을 날릴 때라고!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1434.zh-Hans:
<voice 00353_00001434><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我作为老搭档向你保证，以你现在的实力，
即使去了大都市也一定会受欢迎的。
你作为搞笑普库里坡闻名世界的时机到来了！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1434.zh-Hant:
<voice 00353_00001434><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我作為老搭檔向你保證，以你現在的實力，
即使去了大都市也一定會受歡迎的。
你作為搞笑普庫里坡聞名世界的時機到來了！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1436.en:
<voice 00383_00001436><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>By the way, you seem to be carrying
way less than before. You didn't lose
your Zoomstone at least, right?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1436.ja:
<voice 00383_00001436><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「って……そういえば　ずいぶん荷物が少ないな。
　まさか　お前　ルーラストーンを
　なくしちゃ　いないだろうな。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1436.ko:
<voice 00383_00001436><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 어…… 그런데 이상하게 짐이 적다?
　너 설마 루라 스톤을
　잃어버린 건 아니지?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1436.zh-Hans:
<voice 00383_00001436><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>说起来，你的行李真少呢。
你该不会把
鲁拉之石弄丢了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1436.zh-Hant:
<voice 00383_00001436><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>說起來，你的行李真少呢。
你該不會把魯拉石
弄丟了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1437.en:
<voice 00462_00001437><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>For cryin' out...
Not only don't you have the Zoomstone,
you don't even have the joke book I gave you as a goodbye gift,
or anything else!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1437.ja:
<voice 00462_00001437><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「おいおい……。ルーラストーンどころか
　オレが　せんべつにあげた　ネタ帖も
　何もかも　持ってないじゃないか！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1437.ko:
<voice 00462_00001437><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 잠깐만……. 루라 스톤만이 아니라
　내가 작별 선물로 준 소재 메모장까지
　싹 다 사라졌잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1437.zh-Hans:
<voice 00462_00001437><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>喂喂……别说鲁拉之石了，
你连我送的饯别礼物的笑料集
也都没有带啊！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1437.zh-Hant:
<voice 00462_00001437><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>喂喂……別說魯拉石了，
你連我送的餞別禮物的笑料集
也都沒有帶！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1438.en:
<voice 00491_00001438><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>...That's not good.
You gotta go talk with the chief
as soon as possible.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1438.ja:
<voice 00491_00001438><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……こりゃあ　まずいぞ。
　ひとまず　大急ぎで
　村長さんに　相談したほうがいいぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1438.ko:
<voice 00491_00001438><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……이거 야단났군. 일단 당장
　촌장님께 말씀드리는 게 좋겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1438.zh-Hans:
<voice 00491_00001438><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……这可不行啊。
总之还是赶紧
和村长商量下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1438.zh-Hant:
<voice 00491_00001438><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……這可不行啊。
總之還是趕緊
和村長商量一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1440.en:
<voice 00521_00001440><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Once you've left the v-village...(sniff)
Oops, can't let myself get all mushy.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1440.ja:
<voice 00521_00001440><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「プクレットの村から　旅立ちゅ……
　おっと　かんじまった。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1440.ko:
<voice 00521_00001440><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 푸크레트 마을을 떠냐……
　이런, 혀가 꼬였군.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1440.zh-Hans:
<voice 00521_00001440><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>从普库莱特村踏上旅兔……
哎哟，口误了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1440.zh-Hant:
<voice 00521_00001440><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>從普庫萊特村踏上旅兔……
哎喲，口誤了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1441.en: <voice 00551_00001441><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Once you've left the village, be sure to...<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1441.ja:
<voice 00551_00001441><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「プクレットの村から　旅立つのは
　その後に……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1441.ko:
<voice 00551_00001441><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 푸크레트 마을을 떠나는 건
　그 뒤에……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1441.zh-Hans:
<voice 00551_00001441><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>从普库莱特村踏上旅途
要等这件事情解决之后……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1441.zh-Hant:
<voice 00551_00001441><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>從普庫萊特村踏上旅途
就等這件事解決之後……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1442.ja: <voice 00595_00001442><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ダメだよ！！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1442.ko: <voice 00595_00001442><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 안 돼!!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1443.en:
<voice 00681_00001443><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>What the? You're that little
pipsqueak called...Pudin, right?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1443.ja:
<voice 00681_00001443><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「なんだ？　この　チビすけ……。
　ええと……たしか…プディンだっけ？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1443.ko:
<voice 00681_00001443><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 응? 이 꼬맹이는 뭐야……?
　가만있자…… 이름이 아마… 푸딩이었지?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1443.zh-Hans:
<voice 00681_00001443><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>怎么回事？这个小豆丁……
嗯……好像是叫……布丁吧？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1443.zh-Hant:
<voice 00681_00001443><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>怎麼回事？這個小不點……
呃……好像是叫……布汀吧？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1444.en:
<voice 00741_00001444><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>Don't do it! Please, don't go!
Don't leave the village again!!
Forget about our promise!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1444.ja:
<voice 00741_00001444><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ダメ！　絶対ダメ！
　もう村の外へは　行っちゃダメだよ！！
　ボクとの約束なんて　もういいから！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1444.ko:
<voice 00741_00001444><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 안 돼! 절대 안 돼!
　이제 마을 밖으로 나가면 안 돼!!
　나랑 한 약속은 안 지켜도 되니까!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1444.zh-Hans:
<voice 00741_00001444><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>不行！绝对不行！
不可以再去村子外面了！！
你忘掉我们之间的约定吧！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1444.zh-Hant:
<voice 00741_00001444><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>不行！絕對不行！
不可以再到村子外面了！！
我們之間的約定已經不重要了！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1445.ja: <voice 00771_00001445><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「だって……だって……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1445.ko: <voice 00771_00001445><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 왜냐하면…… 왜냐하면……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1445.zh-Hans: <voice 00771_00001445><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>因为……因为……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1445.zh-Hant: <voice 00771_00001445><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>因為……因為……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1446.en:
<voice 00822_00001446><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>.
What's all this about a promise?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1446.ja:
<voice 00822_00001446><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「おいおい　<pc>。
　お前　このプディンと　何か約束したのか？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1446.ko:
<voice 00822_00001446><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 잠깐, <pc>.

1468.en: <voice 00695_00001468><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>You really lost it?!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1468.ko: <voice 00695_00001468><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 정말로 잃어버린 거냐!?<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1468.zh-Hans: <voice 00695_00001468><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>真的弄丢了？！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1468.zh-Hant: <voice 00695_00001468><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>真的弄丟了！？<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1476.en:
<voice 00829_00001476><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>Hmm. Now that IS a problem.
A Zoomstone's a globetrotter's lifeblood.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1476.ja:
<voice 00829_00001476><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「ふむ。困ったことに　なったのう……。
　ルーラストーンとは　世界を旅する者にとって
　命づなとなる　大切な物じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1476.ko:
<voice 00829_00001476><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 흐음, 이거 큰일이구먼…….
　루라 스톤은 세상을 여행하는 이들에겐
　생명줄이나 다름 없는 중요한 물건이다.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1476.zh-Hans:
<voice 00829_00001476><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>唉，这可麻烦了……
鲁拉之石对于周游世界的旅行者来说
可是关乎性命的重要物品啊。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1476.zh-Hant:
<voice 00829_00001476><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>唉，這可麻煩了……
魯拉石對於周遊世界的旅行者來說，
可是關乎性命的重要物品啊。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1477.en:
<voice 00903_00001477><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>It's too dangerous to travel without one.
Somehow, you've gotta go find it again.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1477.ja:
<voice 00903_00001477><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「ルーラストーンなしに　旅をするのは
　あまりにも　危険すぎる。
　なんとかして　探しださねば　ならんぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1477.ko:
<voice 00903_00001477><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 루라 스톤 없이 여행하는 건
　너무 위험해.
　어떻게든 찾아야만 한다.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1477.zh-Hans:
<voice 00903_00001477><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>不带鲁拉之石去旅行
实在是太危险了。
无论如何都要找到。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1477.zh-Hant:
<voice 00903_00001477><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>不帶魯拉石去旅行
實在是太危險了。
無論如何都要找到。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1478.en:
<voice 00968_00001478><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>But if you're gonna find it, you'll
need some kinda lead...<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1478.ja:
<voice 00968_00001478><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「じゃが　探そうにも
　何か　手がかりが　ないことには……<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1478.ko:
<voice 00968_00001478><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 하지만 찾으려 해도
　뭔가 단서가 있어야 할 텐데……<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1478.zh-Hans:
<voice 00968_00001478><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>但就算想找，
没有一点头绪的话……<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1478.zh-Hant:
<voice 00968_00001478><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>但就算想找，
沒有一點頭緒的話……<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1479.en: <voice 01028_00001479><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>Eureka! You can go see Eidos!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1479.ja: <voice 01028_00001479><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「そうじゃ！　エイドスが　おった！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1479.ko: <voice 01028_00001479><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 그래! 에이도스가 있었지!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1479.zh-Hans: <voice 01028_00001479><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>对了！不是还有艾伊德斯吗！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1479.zh-Hant: <voice 01028_00001479><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>對了！不是還有艾伊德斯嗎！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1480.en:
<voice 01063_00001480><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>If you ask Sage Eidos, he may be able to
tell you where your lost Zoomstone is.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1480.ja:
<voice 01063_00001480><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「賢者エイドスに頼んでみれば
　<pc>が　なくした　ルーラストーンの
　ありかを　教えてくれるかもしれん。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1480.ko:
<voice 01063_00001480><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 현자 에이도스에게 부탁하면
　네가 잃어버린 루라 스톤이
　어디 있는지 가르쳐 줄지도 모른다.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1480.zh-Hans:
<voice 01063_00001480><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>去拜托贤者艾伊德斯
或许就能知道
<pc>遗失的鲁拉之石的下落了。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1480.zh-Hant:
<voice 01063_00001480><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>去拜託賢者艾伊德斯，
或許就能知道
<pc>遺失的魯拉石下落了。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1481.en:
<voice 01188_00001481><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>Eidos is a human sage...
According to rumor, he knows
everything that happens in the world.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1481.ja:
<voice 01188_00001481><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「エイドスというのは　人間の賢者でな……。
　この世に起きる　すべての物事を知っていると
　ウワサされておる　人物じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1481.ko:
<voice 01188_00001481><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 에이도스는 인간 현자인데…….
　이 세상의 모든 일을 꿰고 있기로
　소문이 자자한 인물이지.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1481.zh-Hans:
<voice 01188_00001481><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>艾伊德斯是一位人类贤者……
传说他知道在这个世界上
发生的一切事情。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1481.zh-Hant:
<voice 01188_00001481><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>艾伊德斯是一位人類賢者……
傳聞說他知道在這世上
發生的一切事情。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1484.en:
<voice 01318_00001484><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>His home, the Sage's Lair, can be
found by leaving the village, taking
the road west, and crossing the bridge in the Popola Region.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1484.ja:
<voice 01318_00001484><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「エイドスが住んでいる　賢者の隠れ家は
　村を出て　街道を西に進み　ポーポラ地方の橋を
　渡っていると　見えてくるはずじゃ。　<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1484.ko:
<voice 01318_00001484><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 에이도스가 사는 현자의 은신처는
　마을 밖 가도를 따라 서쪽으로 가다
　포포라 지방의 다리를 건너면 보일 거다. <stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1484.zh-Hans:
<voice 01318_00001484><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>出了村之后沿着街道向西前进
跨过波波拉地区的桥，
就能看到艾伊德斯的隐居之处了。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1484.zh-Hant:
<voice 01318_00001484><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>出了村後沿著幹道向西前進
越過波波拉地方的橋，
就能看到艾伊德斯住的賢者隱居處了。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1485.en:
<voice 01378_00001485><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>There'll be monsters along the way.
Be careful!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1485.ja:
<voice 01378_00001485><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「道中は　魔物も出る。
　くれぐれも　気をつけて行くんじゃぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1485.ko:
<voice 01378_00001485><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 가도에는 마물도 나타나니
　모쪼록 조심하거라!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1485.zh-Hans:
<voice 01378_00001485><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>路上会有怪物出没。
一定要小心啊！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1485.zh-Hant:
<voice 01378_00001485><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>路上會有怪物出沒。
一定要小心啊！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1486.en:
<voice 00025_00001486><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Come on, give it a rest already.
Okay? Pudin?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1486.ja:
<voice 00025_00001486><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「もう　カンベンしてくれよー。
　なあ。プディン？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1486.ko:
<voice 00025_00001486><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 이제 제발 그만 울어.
　응? 푸딩.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1486.zh-Hans:
<voice 00025_00001486><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你就放过我吧，
布丁？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1486.zh-Hant:
<voice 00025_00001486><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你就放過我吧，
布汀？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1487.en:
<voice 00065_00001487><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>Sowwry... 'M sowwry...
I dob't wanna mek eny mo pwomises...
Sniff...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1487.ja:
<voice 00065_00001487><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……。
　……もう　約束なんか　いいから……
　うっ　うっ……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1487.ko:
<voice 00065_00001487><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 미안해…… 미안해…….
　……이제 약속은 안 지켜도 되니까……
　윽, 흑…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1487.zh-Hans:
<voice 00065_00001487><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>对不起……对不起……
……约定什么的，已经不重要了……
呜呜……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1487.zh-Hant:
<voice 00065_00001487><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>對不起……對不起……
……約定什麼的，已經不重要了……
嗚嗚……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1488.en: <voice 00105_00001488><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>And there you go again...<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1488.ja: <voice 00105_00001488><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「だーかーらあー。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1488.ko: <voice 00105_00001488><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 아니, 그러니까아~<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1488.zh-Hans: <voice 00105_00001488><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>所——以——说啊——<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1488.zh-Hant: <voice 00105_00001488><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>所──以──說啊──<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1489.en:
<voice 00190_00001489><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>...Oh, <pc>?
How'd it go? With the Zoomstone, I mean.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1489.ja:
<voice 00190_00001489><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……ん　<pc>か。
　どうだった？　ルーラストーンは。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1489.ko:
<voice 00190_00001489><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……응? {pc}|hpp(이구나,구나).
　루라 스톤은 어떻게 됐어?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1489.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00001489><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……嗯，是<pc>啊？
鲁拉之石怎么样了？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1489.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00001489><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……嗯，是<pc>啊？
魯拉石怎麼樣了？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1490.en:
<voice 00220_00001490><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>...Whoa, really?
You were told to leave forー?
Oops, almost got mushy again.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1490.ja:
<voice 00220_00001490><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……へえー　そうなのか。
　エイロスのほこらへ　行って……
　おっと　かんじまった。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1490.ko:
<voice 00220_00001490><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……흐음, 그렇구나.
　에이로스의 성소에 가서……
　이런, 또 혀가 꼬였네.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1490.zh-Hans:
<voice 00220_00001490><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……哦，这样啊。
要前往艾伊螺丝的祠堂……
哎哟，口误了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1490.zh-Hant:
<voice 00220_00001490><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……喔，這樣啊。
要前往艾伊螺絲的祠堂……
哎喲，口誤了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1491.en:
<voice 00250_00001491><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>You were told to leave for Eidos's lair
to ask about the Zoomstone? It's
kinda far off, so be careful!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1491.ja:
<voice 00250_00001491><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「エイドスのほこらへ　行って
　ルーラストーンのありかを　教えてもらうのか。
　ちょっと　遠いから　気をつけてな！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1491.ko:
<voice 00250_00001491><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 에이도스의 성소에 가서
　루라 스톤이 어디 있는지 물어보겠단 말이지.
　조금 머니까 조심해서 다녀와!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1491.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00001491><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>要前往艾伊德斯的祠堂，
去询问鲁拉之石的所在之处啊。
路途有些远，要小心啊！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1491.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00001491><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>要前往艾伊德斯的祠堂，
詢問魯拉石的所在之處啊。
路途有些遠，要小心啊！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1492.en:
<voice 00657_00001492><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Confound it... This stuff
never gives me a break, does it...?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1492.ja:
<voice 00657_00001492><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「やれやれ……この老いぼれの手を
　いつまでも　わずらわせおって……。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1492.ko:
<voice 00657_00001492><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 나 원…… 대체 언제까지
　이 늙은이를 귀찮게 할는지…….<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1492.zh-Hans:
<voice 00657_00001492><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>唉……还想让我这把老骨头
操劳到什么时候啊……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1492.zh-Hant:
<voice 00657_00001492><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>唉……還想讓我這把老骨頭
操勞到什麼時候啊……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1493.en:
<voice 00875_00001493><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>But if I let this... get out,
this land will be destroyed.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1493.ja:
<voice 00875_00001493><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「じゃが　この………を　地上へ出せば
　この地は　滅びる。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1493.ko:
<voice 00875_00001493><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 허나 이 ………이 지상으로 나오면
　이곳은 멸망한다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1493.zh-Hans:
<voice 00875_00001493><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>但是，如果让这个……扩散到地面，
这片土地会走向毁灭的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1493.zh-Hant:
<voice 00875_00001493><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>但是，如果要是讓這個……擴散到地上去，
這片土地會毀滅掉的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1494.en:
<voice 00935_00001494><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Now, once more!
I'll seal it off again!!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1494.ja:
<voice 00935_00001494><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「今　ひとたび！
　封印させて　もらうぞ！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1494.ko:
<voice 00935_00001494><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 지금 다시!
　봉인하도록 하지!!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1494.zh-Hans:
<voice 00935_00001494><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>趁现在！
先把它封印住吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1494.zh-Hant:
<voice 00935_00001494><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>趁現在！
先把它封印住吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1495.en:
<voice 01716_00001495><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Phew...what a pain.
I'm not sure how much longer
I can keep this up...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1495.ja:
<voice 01716_00001495><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「フゥ……骨が折れるわい。
　まったく　いつまでも　キリのない……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1495.ko:
<voice 01716_00001495><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 후우…… 삭신이 쑤시는군.
　나 원, 몇 번을 해도 끝이 없으니……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1495.zh-Hans:
<voice 01716_00001495><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>呼……真折腾我这把老骨头。
真是的，没完没了啊……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1495.zh-Hant:
<voice 01716_00001495><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>呼……真折騰我這把老骨頭。
真是的，沒完沒了啊……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1497.en: <voice 01865_00001497><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>What do you think you're doing here?!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1497.ja: <voice 01865_00001497><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「そこで　何をしている！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1497.ko: <voice 01865_00001497><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 거기서 뭘 하는 게냐!!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1497.zh-Hans: <voice 01865_00001497><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你在那里做什么！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1497.zh-Hant: <voice 01865_00001497><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你在那裡做什麼！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1498.en:
<voice 01895_00001498><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Naughty Pukulipo!! How many
times must I tell you not to enter my
shrine without permission?!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1498.ja:
<voice 01895_00001498><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「いたずらプクリポめがっ！！
　この　賢者エイドスのほこらに　勝手に入るなと
　何度言えば　わかるのじゃ！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1498.ko:
<voice 01895_00001498><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 이 말썽꾸러기 푸크리포 같으니라고!!
　이 현자 에이도스의 성소에 허락 없이 들어오지
　말라고 몇 번을 말해야 알아듣는 게냐!!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1498.zh-Hans:
<voice 01895_00001498><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>捣蛋鬼普库里坡！！
我说了多少遍了！不要擅自闯入
本贤者艾伊德斯的祠堂里来！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1498.zh-Hant:
<voice 01895_00001498><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>搗蛋鬼普庫里坡！！
我說了多少遍了！不要擅自闖入
本賢者艾伊德斯的祠堂啊！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1504.en: Eidos took <pc> out of the chamber...
1504.ja:
<pc>は　エイドスに連れられて
その場を離れた……。
1504.zh-Hans:
<pc>被艾伊德斯
带离了这里……
1504.zh-Hant:
<pc>被艾伊德斯
帶離了這裡……

1505.en:
<voice 02215_00001505><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Honestly! You Pukulipo are
like mice, poking your heads in through
any little gap you can find!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1505.ja:
<voice 02215_00001505><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……まったく！　なりが小さいからといって
　スキマとみれば　首を　つっこむ！
　プクリポは　ネズミと同じじゃ！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1505.ko:
<voice 02215_00001505><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……쯧! 몸집이 작다고 틈만 보이면
　천지 분간 못 하고 숨어드니!
　푸크리포는 쥐새끼와 다를 바가 없어!!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1505.zh-Hans:
<voice 02215_00001505><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……真是的！
因为个子小就到处钻！
普库里坡简直跟小老鼠似的！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1505.zh-Hant:
<voice 02215_00001505><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……真是的！
因為個子小就到處鑽！
普庫里坡簡直跟小老鼠沒兩樣！！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1506.ko: <voice 02350_00001506><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 잘 듣거라!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1507.en:
<voice 02394_00001507><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>On the other side of that seal...lurks
an evil so great that your little Pukulipo
minds can't even comprehend it.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1507.ja:
<voice 02394_00001507><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「あの結界の　向こう側には……
　お前たち　プクリポのアタマでは　考えも及ばぬ
　大いなる災いが　封印されておるのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1507.ko:
<voice 02394_00001507><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 저 결계 너머에는……
　너희 푸크리포의 머리로는 상상도 하지 못할
　거대한 재앙이 봉인되어 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1507.zh-Hans:
<voice 02394_00001507><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>在那个结界的另一边……
封印着凭你们普库里坡的小脑瓜
根本无法想象的大灾难。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1507.zh-Hant:
<voice 02394_00001507><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>在那個結界的另一邊……
封印著憑你們普庫里坡的腦袋
根本無法想像的大災難。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1508.en:
Everything it touches is destroyed. The plants wither, the rocks crumble, the water turns foul,
and all living things are wiped out...
1508.ja:
<voice 02529_00001508><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「災いは　触れた物すべてを滅ぼす。
　草木は枯れ　岩は崩れさり　水は腐り……
　生き物も　皆……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1508.ko:
<voice 02529_00001508><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 재앙은 접촉한 모든 것을 멸망시킨다.
　초목은 시들고, 바위는 바스러지고,
　물은 썩으며…… 생명체도 모두……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1508.zh-Hans:
<voice 02529_00001508><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>灾难能够摧毁一切事物。
树木干枯，岩石崩塌，河水腐臭……
生物也全部都会……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1508.zh-Hant:
<voice 02529_00001508><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>災難能夠摧毀一切事物。
樹木乾枯，岩石崩塌，河水腐臭……
生物也全部都會……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1509.en:
<voice 02664_00001509><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>The chamber you just walked into
was full of that substance...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1509.ja:
<voice 02664_00001509><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「お前は……先ほど　洞くつに入り込み
　あの　大いなる災いが　ふきだす
　ただなかを　歩いてきたはずじゃな……。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1509.ko:
<voice 02664_00001509><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 넌…… 조금 전 동굴에 들어오면서
　그 거대한 재앙이 뿜어져 나오는
　길 한복판을 걸었을 터인데…….<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1509.zh-Hans:
<voice 02664_00001509><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>刚才难道你……进入洞窟之后
就这样穿过了那个
正在喷发的大灾难吗……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1509.zh-Hant:
<voice 02664_00001509><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你剛才……進入洞窟後，
應該就這麼一路走過
正在噴發的大災難吧……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1510.en: <voice 02813_00001510><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>And yet...you're still alive.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1510.ja:
<voice 02813_00001510><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「しかし　お前は……
　こうして　生きておる。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1510.ko:
<voice 02813_00001510><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 하지만 넌……
　이렇게 살아 있지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1510.zh-Hans:
<voice 02813_00001510><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>可是，你……
居然还活着。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1510.zh-Hant:
<voice 02813_00001510><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>可是你……
卻還活得好好的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1511.en: <voice 02873_00001511><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Hmmm... That could only mean...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1511.ja: <voice 02873_00001511><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「ふうむ……とすれば………つまり……。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1511.ko: <voice 02873_00001511><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 흠…… 그렇다면……… 즉…….<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1511.zh-Hans: <voice 02873_00001511><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>唔……那么……也就是说……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1511.zh-Hant: <voice 02873_00001511><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>嗯……這麼一來……也就是說……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1512.en: <voice 02933_00001512><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>No way... You too...?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1512.ja: <voice 02933_00001512><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「まさか……お前も　なのか……？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1512.ko: <voice 02933_00001512><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 설마…… 너도 그런 거냐……?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1512.zh-Hans: <voice 02933_00001512><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>难道说……你也一样……吗？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1512.zh-Hant: <voice 02933_00001512><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>難道說……你也……一樣嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1513.en:
<voice 03023_00001513><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Very well!
Please forget my earlier rudeness.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1513.ja: <voice 03023_00001513><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「よかろう！　先ほどの無礼は　忘れよう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1513.ko: <voice 03023_00001513><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 좋다! 조금 전의 무례는 잊기로 하지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1513.zh-Hans: <voice 03023_00001513><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>好吧！我就忘掉你刚才的无礼行为吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1513.zh-Hant: <voice 03023_00001513><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>好吧！我就忘掉你剛才的無禮行為吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1514.en:
<voice 03083_00001514><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>You've come all this way to visit
me in this remote location. You must
have a favor to ask of me.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1514.ja:
<voice 03083_00001514><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「こんな　人里離れた隠れ家まで
　はるばる　わしを訪ねてきたのだ。
　何か　頼みごとが　あるのじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1514.ko:
<voice 03083_00001514><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 이 외딴 은신처까지
　먼 길을 달려 날 찾아온 것을 보면
　뭔가 부탁이 있는 걸 테지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1514.zh-Hans:
<voice 03083_00001514><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你不辞辛苦
跑到这个远离世俗的地方来找我，
一定是有什么事情拜托我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1514.zh-Hant:
<voice 03083_00001514><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你不辭辛苦
跑到這個遠離世俗的地方來找我，
一定是有什麼事情要拜託我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1515.en:
<voice 03203_00001515><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Ask away.
I, Sage Eidos, am at your service.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1515.ja:
<voice 03203_00001515><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「話してみるといい。この賢者エイドス
　お前のチカラに　なってやろう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1515.ko:
<voice 03203_00001515><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 얘기해 보거라.
　나 현자 에이도스가 네게 힘을 빌려주마.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1515.zh-Hans:
<voice 03203_00001515><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>说来听听吧。
我贤者艾伊德斯愿意帮助你。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1515.zh-Hant:
<voice 03203_00001515><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>說來聽聽吧。
我賢者艾伊德斯願意幫助你。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1516.en:
<voice 03411_00001516><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...I see.
So that's what you need.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1516.ja:
<voice 03411_00001516><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……<pc>。
　お前は　こう言うのだな？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1516.ko:
<voice 03411_00001516><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……<pc>,
　네 말은 이런 뜻이로군?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1516.zh-Hans:
<voice 03411_00001516><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……<pc>。
你是要这样说吧？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1516.zh-Hant:
<voice 03411_00001516><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……<pc>。
你是要這樣說吧？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1517.en:
<voice 03486_00001517><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>You've lost your Zoomstone and
have no idea where it went, so you
need me to find it for you, huh?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1517.ja:
<voice 03486_00001517><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「ルーラストーンを　なくしてしまったが
　どこにいったのか　まったく　わからない。
　それを　わしに探してほしい……と。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1517.ko:
<voice 03486_00001517><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 루라 스톤을 잃어버렸지만
　어디에 있는지 전혀 짐작이 가지 않는다.
　그것을 내가 찾아 줬으면 한다…….<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1517.zh-Hans:
<voice 03486_00001517><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你想对我说，你遗失了鲁拉之石，
但是完全不知道丢在了哪里。
所以希望我能帮忙寻找……对吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1517.zh-Hant:
<voice 03486_00001517><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你想對我說，你遺失了魯拉石，
但是完全不知道丟在了哪裡。
所以希望我能幫忙尋找……對吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1518.en:
<voice 03621_00001518><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Very well.
I can find where your Zoomstone is...
I'm an all-seeing sage, after all.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1518.ja:
<voice 03621_00001518><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「いかにも。お前のルーラストーンが
　どこにあるか……　わしにかかれば
　何もかも　お見通しじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1518.ko:
<voice 03621_00001518><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 물론 내 능력을 사용하면
　네 루라 스톤이 어디 있는지 정도는
　바로 알아낼 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1518.zh-Hans:
<voice 03621_00001518><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>没错，
你的鲁拉之石究竟在哪里……
这种事情早就在我的掌握之中了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1518.zh-Hant:
<voice 03621_00001518><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>沒錯，
你的魯拉石究竟在哪裡……
這種事情早就在我的掌握之中了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1519.en:
<voice 03726_00001519><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>However...even if you learn where it is,
you will likely have to overcome
many trials in order to get it back.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1519.ja:
<voice 03726_00001519><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「だが……たとえ　ありかが　わかったとしても
　それを　取り戻すためには　お前は
　試練を乗り越えねばならぬようじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1519.ko:
<voice 03726_00001519><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 루라 스톤의 위치를 알아내도
　그걸 찾기 위해서는
　네가 시련을 통과해야만 할 것 같구나.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1519.zh-Hans:
<voice 03726_00001519><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>但是……就算知道所在地，
不通过试炼也是
无法将它取回的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1519.zh-Hant:
<voice 03726_00001519><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>但是……就算知道所在地，
你似乎還是得通過考驗
才能將它取回。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1520.en:
<voice 03845_00001520><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Now, hold still.
I'm going to cast a spell on you...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1520.ja:
<voice 03845_00001520><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……さあ。じっとしていなさい。
　わしが　まじないをかけてやろう……。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1520.ko:
<voice 03845_00001520><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……자, 가만히 있거라.
　내가 주술을 걸어 줄 테니…….<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1520.zh-Hans:
<voice 03845_00001520><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……不要动，
我来给你施展魔法……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1520.zh-Hant:
<voice 03845_00001520><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……不要動，
我來為你施加咒術……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1521.en: <voice 04150_00001521><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>The Zoomstone was stolen...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1521.ja: <voice 04150_00001521><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「お前から　ルーラストーンをうばい……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1521.ko: <voice 04150_00001521><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 네게서 루라 스톤을 빼앗고……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1521.zh-Hans: <voice 04150_00001521><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>夺走了你的鲁拉之石……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1521.zh-Hant: <voice 04150_00001521><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>奪走你的魯拉石……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1522.en:
<voice 04204_00001522><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...The thief is someone who lurks in
the darkness and is seldom seen.
But...with this spell...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1522.ja:
<voice 04204_00001522><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……すべてを　うばった者は
　暗闇にひそみ　めったに姿を現さぬ。
　じゃが……この　まじないをかければ……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1522.ko:
<voice 04204_00001522><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……모든 것을 앗아간 자는 어둠 속에 숨어
　쉽게 모습을 드러내지 않을 것이다.
　하지만…… 이 주술을 걸면……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1522.zh-Hans:
<voice 04204_00001522><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……并且夺去了一切的人，
隐藏在黑暗之中不肯露面。
但是……只要施了这个魔法……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1524.zh-Hant:

<voice 00270_00001531><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>I can't take it anymore.

<voice 00270_00001531><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「まいったよ。<pc>が出かけてから

1532.en:
<voice 00345_00001532><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>I'm going out for some fresh air.

1534.en:
<voice 00645_00001534><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>Thank goodness you're okay!

<voice 00853_00001535><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>...What? You went to see the sage Eidos?

1535.zh-Hans:
<voice 00853_00001535><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……咦？

1535.zh-Hant:

1536.en: <voice 01018_00001536><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>What could that mean...?<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1536.ko: <voice 01018_00001536><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 대체 무슨 뜻이지…………?<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1536.zh-Hant: <voice 01018_00001536><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>是什麼意思呢…………<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1537.en:
<voice 01108_00001537><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>I...I get it! You lost your memory...because

<voice 01108_00001537><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「わ…わかった！　<pc>さんは

1537.ko:
<voice 01108_00001537><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 아… 알겠어! <pc> 씨는
　역시 그 녀석과 싸우는 바람에……

1537.zh-Hans:
<voice 01108_00001537><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我……我知道了！<pc>你
果然是因为和那家伙战斗……
才失去了记忆！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1537.zh-Hant:
<voice 01108_00001537><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我……我知道了！<pc>你
果然是因為和那傢伙戰鬥……
才會失去了記憶！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1538.en: <voice 01228_00001538><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>But...that means...for my sake, you...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1538.ja:
<voice 01228_00001538><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「そんな……だって……
　ボクなんかのために……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1538.ko:
<voice 01228_00001538><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…… 나 때문에……

1538.zh-Hans:
<voice 01228_00001538><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>怎么会……

1538.zh-Hant:
<voice 01228_00001538><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>怎麼會……因為……
為了我這種人……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1539.ko: <voice 01271_00001539><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 흑…… 으흑…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1540.ja: <voice 01331_00001540><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「うわああああああああんっ！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1540.zh-Hans: <voice 01331_00001540><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>呜啊啊啊啊啊啊！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1540.zh-Hant: <voice 01331_00001540><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>嗚哇啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1541.en: <voice 01392_00001541><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>...Whenever I was crying all alone...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1541.ja:
<voice 01392_00001541><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「……ボクが　ひとりで泣いてると

1541.ko:
<voice 01392_00001541><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: ……내가 혼자 울고 있으면
　언제나…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1541.zh-Hans:
<voice 01392_00001541><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……每当我
一个人哭泣的时候……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1541.zh-Hant:
<voice 01392_00001541><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……每當我
一個人哭泣的時候……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001481.en:
<voice 01412_19001481><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>You always showed up and did
all sorts of stuff to make me laugh.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001481.ja:
<voice 01412_19001481><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんが来て　いっぱい　いっぱい
　面白いことを　見せてくれたよね。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001481.ko:
<voice 01412_19001481><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨가 와서
　재미있는 개그를 보여 줬어.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001481.zh-Hans:
<voice 01412_19001481><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001><pc>就会过来给我看很多很多
有趣的表演。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001481.zh-Hant:
<voice 01412_19001481><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001><pc>來了就會讓我看
很多很多有趣的表演呢。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1543.en:
<voice 01432_00001543><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>But...after my mom and dad were killed
by a monster from Defiled Valley...
I was too sad to laugh any more.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1543.ja:
<voice 01432_00001543><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「でも　ボク……けがれの谷に出る魔物に
　お父さんと　お母さんを殺されてから
　……悲しくて　笑えなくて。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1543.ko:
<voice 01432_00001543><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 부정의 계곡에 나타나는
　마물에게 아빠와 엄마가 죽은 뒤로
　……슬퍼서 웃을 수가 없었어.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1543.zh-Hans:
<voice 01432_00001543><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>但是，我……因为我的父母被
出没在污秽之谷的怪物杀死了，
……所以很悲伤，根本笑不出来。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1543.zh-Hant:
<voice 01432_00001543><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>可是……自從我父母
被出沒在汙穢之谷的怪物殺死後，
……我就一直很難過，笑不出來。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1544.en:
<voice 01452_00001544><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>When I apologized, you patted
me on the head and said...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1544.ja:
<voice 01452_00001544><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ボクが　ごめんなさいって　あやまったら
　<pc>さん　ボクの頭をなでて
　こう言ってくれたよね。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1544.ko:
<voice 01452_00001544><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 내가 미안하다고 사과했더니
　<pc> 씨는 내 머리를 쓰다듬으면서
　이렇게 말해 줬잖아.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1544.zh-Hans:
<voice 01452_00001544><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我为此向你道歉，
可是<pc>你却抚摸着我的头，
这么对我说。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1544.zh-Hant:
<voice 01452_00001544><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我為此向你道歉，
可是<pc>你卻撫摸著我的頭，
這麼對我說。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000851.en: <voice 01592_19000851><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>'It's okay, Pudin.'<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000851.ja: <voice 01592_19000851><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「だいじょうぶだよ　プディン。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000851.ko: <voice 01592_19000851><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 괜찮아, 푸딩.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000851.zh-Hans: <voice 01592_19000851><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没关系的，布丁。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000851.zh-Hant: <voice 01592_19000851><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>沒關係的，布汀。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000852.en: <voice 01592_19000852><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>'It's okay, Pudin.'<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000852.ja: <voice 01592_19000852><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「だいじょうぶだよ　プディン。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000852.ko: <voice 01592_19000852><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 괜찮아, 푸딩.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000852.zh-Hans: <voice 01592_19000852><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>没关系的，布丁。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000853.en:
<voice 01667_19000853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>As this village's champion,
it's my duty to make sure that all the
villagers can laugh and live happily.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000853.ja:
<voice 01667_19000853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「村のチャンピオンは　村のみんなが
　笑って暮らせるようにするのが　役目。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000853.ko:
<voice 01667_19000853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 마을 챔피언의 역할은 마을 사람
　모두가 웃으며 살 수 있게 하는 것.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000853.zh-Hans:
<voice 01667_19000853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>让村里的大家都能笑着度过每一天，
这就是村里的冠军的职责。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000853.zh-Hant:
<voice 01667_19000853><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>讓村裡的大家都能笑著度過每一天，
這就是村裡冠軍的職責。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

it's my duty to make sure that all the
villagers can laugh and live happily.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01667_19000854><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「村のチャンピオンは　村のみんなが
　笑って暮らせるようにするのが　役目。<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

　모두가 웃으며 살 수 있게 하는 것.<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000855.en:
<voice 01757_19000855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>'If anyone steals a smile from a fellow
villager, then as champion, I'll...'<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000855.ja:
<voice 01757_19000855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「村の仲間から　笑顔をうばうヤツは
　チャンピオンの名にかけて……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000855.ko:
<voice 01757_19000855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 마을 동료들의 미소를 빼앗는 녀석은
　챔피언의 이름을 걸고……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000855.zh-Hans:
<voice 01757_19000855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>夺走村里伙伴笑容的家伙，
我要以冠军之名……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000855.zh-Hant:
<voice 01757_19000855><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>奪走村裡夥伴笑容的傢伙，
我會賭上冠軍之名……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000856.en:
<voice 01757_19000856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>'If anyone steals a smile from a fellow
villager, then as champion, I'll...'<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000856.ja:
<voice 01757_19000856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「村の仲間から　笑顔をうばうヤツは
　チャンピオンの名にかけて……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000856.ko:
<voice 01757_19000856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 마을 동료들의 미소를 빼앗는 녀석은
　챔피언의 이름을 걸고……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000856.zh-Hans:
<voice 01757_19000856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>夺走村里伙伴笑容的家伙，
我要以冠军之名……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
