<voice 01757_19000856><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>奪走村裡夥伴笑容的傢伙，
我會賭上冠軍之名……<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1548.en:
<voice 01951_00001548><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>...Then you left for Defiled Valley
alone to avenge my parents' death...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1548.ja:
<voice 01951_00001548><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「……それから　<pc>さんは
　ぼくのお父さんと　お母さんの　カタキを討ちに
　たったひとりで　けがれの谷へ……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1548.ko:
<voice 01951_00001548><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: ……그러곤 <pc> 씨는
　우리 부모님의 원수를 갚으러
　혼자 부정의 계곡으로…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1548.zh-Hans:
<voice 01951_00001548><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……那之后<pc>就
为了替我父母报仇
独自一人前往污秽之谷了……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1548.zh-Hant:
<voice 01951_00001548><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……後來<pc>
為了替我父母報仇，
獨自一人前往汙穢之谷了……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1550.en:
<voice 02101_00001550><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>I get it...
So maybe that's where you lost
your Zoomstone, too.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1550.ja:
<voice 02101_00001550><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「そうか……。
　たぶん　そこで　<pc>さんは
　ルーラストーンも　なくしてしまったんだね。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1550.ko:
<voice 02101_00001550><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 그래…….
　<pc> 씨는 아마 거기서
　루라 스톤도 잃어버린 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1550.zh-Hans:
<voice 02101_00001550><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>对了……
<pc>大概就是在那里
将鲁拉之石弄丢了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1550.zh-Hant:
<voice 02101_00001550><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>這樣啊……
<pc>大概就是在那裡
將魯拉石給弄丟了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1551.en:
<voice 02146_00001551><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>...You did all of that for my sake,
didn't you? If you need a
Zoomstone, then take mine!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1551.ja:
<voice 02146_00001551><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「…………ボクなんかのために。
　ねえ！　ルーラストーンが　必要なら
　ボクが持ってるのを　あげるよ！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1551.ko:
<voice 02146_00001551><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: …………나 같은 녀석 때문에.
　저기! 루라 스톤이 필요하면
　내 걸 줄게!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1551.zh-Hans:
<voice 02146_00001551><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>…………居然为了我这样的人。
如果！如果你真的需要鲁拉之石，
我把我的给你！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1551.zh-Hant:
<voice 02146_00001551><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>…………居然為了我這樣的人。
如果！如果你真的需要魯拉石，
我把我的給你！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001532.ja:
<pc>は　ルーラストーンを
むりやり　押しつけられた！<me 61>

39117.en:
The Zoomstone is a magic stone that
lets you travel to any recorded
location instantly. No matter how much you use it, it never runs out.
39117.ja:
ルーラストーンは　記憶させた場所に
一瞬で移動できる　魔法の石です。
何度使っても　なくなりません。
39117.ko:
루라 스톤은 등록한 장소로
단숨에 이동할 수 있는 마법의 돌입니다.
여러 번 사용해도 없어지지 않습니다.
39117.zh-Hans:
鲁拉之石是魔法之石，
可以瞬间让你移动到它记录的地点。
反复使用也不会消失。
39117.zh-Hant:
魯拉石是魔法之石，
可以瞬間讓你移動到它記錄的地點。
反覆使用也不會消失。

19000857.en:
This Zoomstone doesn't have a
location recorded in it yet. You can
record a destination for it in the church.
19000857.ja:
このルーラストーンには
プクレットの村が　記憶されています。
19000857.ko:
이 루라 스톤에는
푸크레트 마을이 새겨져 있습니다.
19000857.zh-Hans:
这块鲁拉之石
记录着普库莱特村。
19000857.zh-Hant:
這塊魯拉石
記錄著普庫萊特村。

19000858.en:
In addition to new towns that you
visit you can also record additional
locations by searching for stone monuments throughout the world.
19000858.ja:
冒険で訪れた場所が　記憶されるほか　
各地にある　いざないの石碑を　しらべることで
そこを　行き先として　記憶させられます。
19000858.ko:
모험에서 방문한 장소가 새겨질 뿐 아니라
각지에 있는 이끌림의 비석을 조사하면
그곳을 목적지로 등록할 수 있습니다.
19000858.zh-Hans:
除了会记录在冒险中探访过的地点以外，
在调查各地的引路石碑后，
更可将其记录为目的地。
19000858.zh-Hant:
除了會記錄在冒險中探訪過的地點以外，
在調查各地的引路石碑後，
更可將其記錄為目的地。

1552.en:
<voice 02356_00001552><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>With this, you don't have to go back to
Defiled Valley, right? I don't care about
revenge anymore! Don't risk your life for me!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1552.ja:
<voice 02356_00001552><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「これがあれば　けがれの谷に行かなくても
　大丈夫だよね？　カタキなんて　もういいから。
　ボクなんかのために　命をかけないで！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1552.ko:
<voice 02356_00001552><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 이게 있으면 부정의 계곡에 안 가도 되지?
　이제 원수는 안 갚아줘도 되니까
　나 같은 녀석 때문에 목숨 걸지 마!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1552.zh-Hans:
<voice 02356_00001552><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>只要有这个，就不用去污秽之谷了吧？
报仇什么的已经够了。
不要为了我这种人而拼上性命！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1552.zh-Hant:
<voice 02356_00001552><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>只要有這個，就不用去汙穢之谷了吧？
報仇什麼的已經夠了。
不要為了我這種人而拚上性命！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1553.en:
<voice 02431_00001553><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>Everyone hates me anyway!
I'm not even from this village!
So stop worrying about me!!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1553.ja:
<voice 02431_00001553><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「どうせ　ボクなんか　きらわれ者なんだ！
　村の仲間じゃないんだからっ！
　ボクのことなんか　ほっといてよっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1553.ko:
<voice 02431_00001553><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 어차피 다들 날 싫어하는걸!
　난 이 마을 사람도 아니니까!
　나 같은 녀석은 그냥 내버려둬!!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1553.zh-Hans:
<voice 02431_00001553><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>反正我是惹人讨厌的家伙！
也不是村子里的伙伴！
不要再管我了！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1553.zh-Hant:
<voice 02431_00001553><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>反正我是惹人討厭的傢伙！
也不是村子裡的夥伴！
不要再管我了！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1555.en: <voice 02555_00001555><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>DON'T BE SILLY!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1555.ja: <voice 02555_00001555><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「ふやけるなーッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1555.ko: <voice 02555_00001555><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 먈 같잖은 소리 집어치워!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1555.zh-Hans: <voice 02555_00001555><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>不要偷懒！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1555.zh-Hant: <voice 02555_00001555><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>不要偷懶！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1556.en:
<voice 02590_00001556><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>If a Man o' War saw you, he'd be filled with
so much pity that HE'D be paralyzed!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1556.ja:
<voice 02590_00001556><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「しびれくらげ先生が　今のお前を見たら
　情けなくて　マヒしちまうぞっ！？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1556.ko:
<voice 02590_00001556><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 저릿해파리 선생님이 지금의 널 보면
　한심해서 마비되시고 말 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1556.zh-Hans:
<voice 02590_00001556><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>麻痹水母老师看到你这副样子
一定会无奈得麻痹住哦？！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1556.zh-Hant:
<voice 02590_00001556><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>要是麻痺水母老師
看到你這副樣子，
一定會無奈地麻痺喔！？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1557.ja: <voice 02694_00001557><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「し　しびれフヤケ先生……？<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1557.ko: <voice 02694_00001557><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 저, 저릿해팔이 선생님……?<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1557.zh-Hans: <voice 02694_00001557><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>麻、麻痹水木老师？<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1557.zh-Hant: <voice 02694_00001557><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>麻、麻痺水木老師……？<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1558.en: <voice 02753_00001558><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Not a 'Minnow War'! A Man o' War!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1558.ja:
<voice 02753_00001558><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「しびれふやけティーチャーじゃねえ！
　しびれくらげ先生だっ！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1558.ko:
<voice 02753_00001558><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 저릿해팔이 티처가 아니라!
　저릿해파리 선생님!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1558.zh-Hans:
<voice 02753_00001558><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>不是麻痹水木老师！
是麻痹水母老师！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1558.zh-Hant:
<voice 02753_00001558><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>不是麻痺水木老師！
是麻痺水母老師！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1559.ja: <voice 02871_00001559><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ご　ごめんなさいっ！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1559.ko: <voice 02871_00001559><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 자, 잘못했어요!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1559.zh-Hans: <voice 02871_00001559><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>对、对不起！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1559.zh-Hant: <voice 02871_00001559><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>對、對不起！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1560.en:
<voice 02923_00001560><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>You're a whiny, wimpy, whimpering wuss
of a brat! You're a baby! A kid! A child!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1560.ja:
<voice 02923_00001560><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「そりゃ　お前は　泣き虫でベソかきで
　ぐずりまくりで　メソメソした　ガキだっ！
　ベイビーだよ　キッズだよ　チャイルドだよ！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1560.ko:
<voice 02923_00001560><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 물론 네가 울보에 찡찡이에
　맨날 질질 짜는 꼬맹이인 건 사실이야!
　베이비! 키즈! 차일드라고!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1560.zh-Hans:
<voice 02923_00001560><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你就是个爱哭的、天天哭的、
每天就知道哭鼻子的小鬼！
婴儿！小孩！小屁孩！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1560.zh-Hant:
<voice 02923_00001560><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>因為你就是個愛哭鬼，
成天哭哭哭的哭個不停！
嬰兒！小孩！小屁孩！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1561.en: <voice 03056_00001561><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>But you know what?!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1561.ja: <voice 03056_00001561><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「でもなあ！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1562.en:
<voice 03086_00001562><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>When you want to cry, you should cry!
Cry and cry and cry and cry and cry
until you're sick of it!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1562.ja:
<voice 03086_00001562><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「泣きたい時は　泣いていいんだ！
　泣いて　泣いて　泣いて　泣いて　泣いて
　泣くのに　あきたら！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1562.ko:
<voice 03086_00001562><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 울고 싶을 때는 울어도 돼!
　울고, 울고, 울고, 또 울다가
　우는 것도 지치면!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1562.zh-Hans:
<voice 03086_00001562><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>想哭的时候，是可以哭的！！
哭着哭着哭着哭着，
哭腻了！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1562.zh-Hant:
<voice 03086_00001562><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>想哭的時候就哭吧！
哭著哭著哭著哭著，
要是哭膩了！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1563.en: <voice 03206_00001563><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Me! <pc>! Everyone in the village!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1563.ja: <voice 03206_00001563><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「オレや！　<pc>や！　村のみんなが！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1563.ko: <voice 03206_00001563><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 나나! <pc>! 마을 사람들이!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1563.zh-Hans: <voice 03206_00001563><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我，或是<pc>，或是村里的人们！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1563.zh-Hant: <voice 03206_00001563><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我，或是<pc>，或是村裡的人們！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1564.en:
<voice 03266_00001564><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>With a knockout one-liner,
we'll make you laugh!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1564.ja:
<voice 03266_00001564><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「必殺の一発芸で！
　プディン！　お前を　笑わしゅてやるっ！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1564.ko:
<voice 03266_00001564><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 필살 개그로!
　푸딩! 널 우껴 주마!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1564.zh-Hans:
<voice 03266_00001564><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>就会用拿手的超短搞笑表演！
让布丁你！笑起来的！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1564.zh-Hant:
<voice 03266_00001564><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我就用拿手的超短搞笑絕活！
讓布汀你！笑起來的！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1565.en:
<voice 03356_00001565><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>We're all worried about you, kid.
Just now, a girl out there asked me
to feed you this Acrobatic Cake...<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1565.ja:
<voice 03356_00001565><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「みんな　お前のこと心配してるんだぜ。
　さっきだってな　お前に食べさせてくれって
　あの女の子が　アクロバットケーキを……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1565.ko:
<voice 03356_00001565><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 다들 널 걱정하고 있어.
　조금 전에도 너한테 주라면서
　여자애가 아크로배트 케이크를……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1565.zh-Hans:
<voice 03356_00001565><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>大家都很担心你。
刚才那个女孩也将杂技蛋糕给我，
让我给你吃……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1565.zh-Hant:
<voice 03356_00001565><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>大家都很擔心你喔。
剛才那個女孩還拿了雜技蛋糕給我，
要我拿給你吃……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1566.en: <voice 03491_00001566><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Shoot!! The cake!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1566.ja: <voice 03491_00001566><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「やべえっ！？　せっかくのケーキが！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1566.ko: <voice 03491_00001566><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 으앗!? 기껏 받아 온 케이크가!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1566.zh-Hans: <voice 03491_00001566><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>糟糕？！要给你的蛋糕！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1566.zh-Hant: <voice 03491_00001566><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>糟糕！？要給你的蛋糕！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1567.en:
<voice 03743_00001567><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>I'm so sorry...Pirippo.
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1567.ja:
<voice 03743_00001567><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ごめんなさい……ピリッポさん。
　<pc>さん。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1567.ko:
<voice 03743_00001567><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 미안해…….
　필립포 씨, <pc> 씨.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1567.zh-Hans:
<voice 03743_00001567><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>对不起……皮利珀，
还有<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1567.zh-Hant:
<voice 03743_00001567><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>對不起……皮利珀，
還有<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1568.ja: <voice 03818_00001568><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ありがとう……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1569.en:
<voice 03952_00001569><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>...I see. So your unfinished business
before leaving the village was to
beat that freak while it's still wounded.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1569.ja:
<voice 03952_00001569><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……そうか。<pc>が
　村を出る前に　やりたいことってのは
　けがれの大ちゃんを　倒すことだったのか。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1569.ko:
<voice 03952_00001569><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……그래, {pc}|hpp(이,가)
　마을을 떠나기 전에 해야 한다던 일이
　부정한 이무기를 해치우는 거였구나.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1569.zh-Hans:
<voice 03952_00001569><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……这样啊。<pc>
在离开村子前还想做的事情
就是去打倒污秽的大蛇蛇啊。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1569.zh-Hant:
<voice 03952_00001569><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……原來如此。
<pc>在離開村子前還想做的事情
就是去打倒汙穢的大蛇蛇啊。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1570.en:
<voice 04087_00001570><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>How very like you to risk your life
as village champion to bring a smile
back to Pudin's face. Hahaha!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1570.ja:
<voice 04087_00001570><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「村のチャンピオンの　名にかけて
　プディンに　笑顔を取り戻すために
　命を張るとは　お前らしいや。はははっ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1570.ko:
<voice 04087_00001570><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 마을 챔피언의 이름을 걸고
　푸딩에게 웃음을 찾아 주기 위해
　목숨을 걸다니 정말 너다워, 하하하.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1570.zh-Hans:
<voice 04087_00001570><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>以村里的冠军之名，
为了让布丁重现笑容而赌上性命，
这还真像是你的作风呢。哈哈哈。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1570.zh-Hant:
<voice 04087_00001570><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>賭上村裡冠軍之名，
為了讓布汀重現笑容而拚上性命，
這還真像你的作風呢。哈哈哈。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1571.en: <voice 04202_00001571><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>But still, this is seriously dangerous...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1571.ja: <voice 04202_00001571><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「でも　やっぱり　あぶないよ……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1571.ko: <voice 04202_00001571><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 그래도 너무 위험해…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1571.zh-Hans: <voice 04202_00001571><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>但是，还是很危险啊……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1571.zh-Hant: <voice 04202_00001571><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>不過，還是很危險啊……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1572.en:
<voice 04267_00001572><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Well, as their former partner, I'm well
aware of how stubborn they can
be. It's no use trying to stop them!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1572.ja:
<voice 04267_00001572><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「こいつの　頑固さは
　もと相方のオレが　保証するぜ！
　止めたって無駄さ！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1572.ko:
<voice 04267_00001572><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 예전 파트너였던 내가 장담하는데
　이 녀석 고집은 절대 못 꺾어!
　그러니 말려도 소용없어!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1572.zh-Hans:
<voice 04267_00001572><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我作为老搭档很清楚
这家伙的性格有多顽固！
想阻止也是没用的！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1572.zh-Hant:
<voice 04267_00001572><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>身為老搭檔，
我很清楚這傢伙有多頑固！
想阻止也是沒用的！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1573.en:
<voice 04357_00001573><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>The Toxic Viper is at the far end of the
northern wasteland, in Defiled Valley.
Your Zoomstone's probably there, too...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1573.ja:
<voice 04357_00001573><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「北の荒れ地……けがれの谷の　いちばん奥に
　けがれの大蛇はいるんだ。<pc>さんの
　ルーラストーンも　たぶん　そこに……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1573.ko:
<voice 04357_00001573><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 부정한 이무기는 북쪽 황무지……
　부정의 계곡 가장 깊은 곳에 살아.
　<pc> 씨의 루라 스톤도 어쩌면…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1573.zh-Hans:
<voice 04357_00001573><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>北边的荒地……污秽大蛇在
污秽之谷最深处。
<pc>的鲁拉之石大概也在那里……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1573.zh-Hant:
<voice 04357_00001573><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>在北邊的荒地……汙穢之谷的最深處
有條汙穢的大蛇。
<pc>的魯拉石大概也在那裡……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1574.en:
<voice 04512_00001574><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>I'm begging you, <pc>. I'll be waiting
here for you in the village, so make sure
you come back alive. Promise me!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1574.ja:
<voice 04512_00001574><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「おねがいだよ　<pc>さん。
　ボク　村で待ってるから
　絶対に　生きて帰ってきてね。約束だよ！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1574.ko:
<voice 04512_00001574><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 부탁이야, <pc> 씨.
　난 마을에서 기다릴 테니까
　꼭 살아 돌아와야 해? 약속한 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1574.zh-Hans:
<voice 04512_00001574><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>拜托了，<pc>。
我会在村子里等着你的，
所以一定要活着回来。约定好了哦！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1574.zh-Hant:
<voice 04512_00001574><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>拜託了，<pc>。
我會在村子裡等著你的，
所以一定要活著回來。說好了喔！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1575.en:
<voice 04627_00001575><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Good luck, <pc>!! Oh, wait! Don't forget
to record the village's location at the
church before going to Defiled Valley!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1575.ja: <voice 04627_00001575><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「がんばれよ　<pc>！！　<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1575.ko: <voice 04627_00001575><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 잘 다녀와라, <pc>!!　<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1578.en:
<voice 00115_00001578><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Right. That promise counts for me,
too! So go show that big lug
what a champion's made of!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1578.ja:
<voice 00115_00001578><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「ああ。オレとも　約束だぜ！
　チャンピオンの底力　けがれの大ちゃんに
　見せつけてやれ！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1578.ko:
<voice 00115_00001578><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 그래, 나하고도 약속한 거다!?
　부정한 이무기한테
　챔피언의 저력을 보여 줘!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1578.zh-Hans:
<voice 00115_00001578><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>嗯。和我也约定好了！
让污秽的大蛇蛇见识见识
冠军的厉害！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1578.zh-Hant:
<voice 00115_00001578><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>嗯，也和我約定好了！
讓汙穢的大蛇蛇見識見識
冠軍的厲害！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1579.en:
<voice 00145_00001579><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Good luck, <pc>!! Don't forget to

1579.ja: <voice 00145_00001579><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「がんばれよ　<pc>！！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1579.ko: <voice 00145_00001579><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 잘 다녀와라, <pc>!!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000859.en:
<voice 00694_19000859><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>Ally of Pukulet Village, here to take
revenge on the Toxic Viper that took
Pudin's parents and stole his smile!!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000859.ja:
<voice 00694_19000859><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>「プクレットの村の仲間　プディンから
　親をうばい　笑顔をうばった
　けがれの大蛇っ！！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000859.ko:
<voice 00694_19000859><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>: 푸크레트 마을의 동료 푸딩의
　부모님을 빼앗고 미소를 빼앗은
　부정한 이무기!!<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000859.zh-Hans:
<voice 00694_19000859><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>污秽大蛇！！
你夺走了普库莱特村的伙伴
布丁的笑容！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000859.zh-Hant:
<voice 00694_19000859><start_lip_sync al01 _normal m00001>奪走普庫萊特村夥伴──
布汀笑容的
汙穢的大蛇！！<stop_lip_animation al01 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1582.en:
<voice 01408_00001582><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Haah... It's no good. I'd never have
come to such a scary place if
Sage Eidos hadn't ordered me to.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1582.ja:
<voice 01408_00001582><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ああ～　いやだ　いやだ。
　エイドスさまの命令じゃなきゃあ
　こんな　こわい所　絶対に来ませんよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1582.ko:
<voice 01408_00001582><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 에휴~ 내 팔자야.
　에이도스 님 명령만 아니었으면
　이런 무시무시한 곳은 절대 안 왔을 텐데.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1582.zh-Hans:
<voice 01408_00001582><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>唉，真讨厌啊真讨厌。
要不是受了艾伊德斯大人的命令，
我绝对不会来这么可怕的地方。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1582.zh-Hant:
<voice 01408_00001582><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>唉～真是討厭。
要不是艾伊德斯大人的命令，
我是絕對不會來這麼可怕的地方。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1583.en:
<voice 01477_00001583><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Uhmm... No lost travelers are
probably gonna come by, are they?
I'll just pretend I'm not here...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1583.ja:
<voice 01477_00001583><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ええと……迷い込んだ旅人は　いませんよね？
　いないことにして……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1583.ko:
<voice 01477_00001583><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 어디 보자…… 길 잃은 여행자는 없죠?
　그럼 없는 셈 치고……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1583.zh-Hans:
<voice 01477_00001583><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>唔……不会有迷路的旅行者吧？
就当做没有吧……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1583.zh-Hant:
<voice 01477_00001583><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>呃……不會有迷路的旅行者吧？
就當做沒有吧……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1584.en: <voice 01574_00001584><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Egad... This is...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1584.ja: <voice 01574_00001584><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あちゃあ……。いたか……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1584.ko: <voice 01574_00001584><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 이런…… 있군…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1584.zh-Hans: <voice 01574_00001584><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>哎呀……还真有啊……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1584.zh-Hant: <voice 01574_00001584><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>哎呀……還真有啊……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1585.en: <voice 01694_00001585><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Ohh... They're already...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1585.ja: <voice 01694_00001585><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ああ～。こりゃあ　もう……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1585.ko: <voice 01694_00001585><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 아이고, 이 친구는 이미…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1585.zh-Hans: <voice 01694_00001585><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>啊啊。这个人已经不行了……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1585.zh-Hant: <voice 01694_00001585><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>啊啊～這個人已經不行了……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1586.en: <voice 01764_00001586><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>And so young, too. I feel sorry for them...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1586.ja: <voice 01764_00001586><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「まだ　若いのに　かわいそうになあ……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1586.ko: <voice 01764_00001586><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 아직 젊은데 안됐어…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1586.zh-Hans: <voice 01764_00001586><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>明明还这么年轻，太可怜了……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1586.zh-Hant: <voice 01764_00001586><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>明明還這麼年輕，太可憐了……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1587.en:
<voice 01847_00001587><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>If I'd come a little earlier, Eidos's
amulet might've saved them.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1587.ja:
<voice 01847_00001587><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「もうすこし　あたしが　早く来てれば
　エイドスさまの魔よけのおかげで
　助かったかも　しれないのに。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1587.ko:
<voice 01847_00001587><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 내가 조금만 더 빨리 왔으면
　에이도스 님의 주술 덕에
　살 수 있었을 텐데.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1587.zh-Hans:
<voice 01847_00001587><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>如果我早来一步，
或许就能靠艾伊德斯的驱魔术
救下这个人了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1587.zh-Hant:
<voice 01847_00001587><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>如果我早來一步，
或許就能靠艾伊德斯大人的驅魔術
救下這個人了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1588.en: <voice 01931_00001588><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>You just got unlucky...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1588.ja: <voice 01931_00001588><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あんた　運がなかったなあ……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1588.ko: <voice 01931_00001588><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 댁도 참 운이 없구만…….<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1588.zh-Hans: <voice 01931_00001588><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你运气真差啊……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1588.zh-Hant: <voice 01931_00001588><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你運氣真差……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1589.en:
<voice 02025_00001589><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Hmm...
You were pretty rich, weren't you?<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1589.ja:
<voice 02025_00001589><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ふむふむ……。
　けっこうな　金持ちじゃないか。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1589.ko:
<voice 02025_00001589><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 오호…….
　이 친구, 꽤나 부자인걸.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1589.zh-Hans:
<voice 02025_00001589><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>哦哦……
还挺有钱的啊。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1589.zh-Hant:
<voice 02025_00001589><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>嗯嗯……
還滿有錢的嘛。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1590.ja:
なんと　<cs_pchero>は
お金を　うばわれた！

1591.en:
<voice 02232_00001591><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>The heck is this...?
Pirippo's Secret Joke Book...?
I don't need this.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1591.ja:
<voice 02232_00001591><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「なんだこりゃ……。
　ピリッポ秘伝のネタ帖……？
　これは　いらないっと。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1591.ko:
<voice 02232_00001591><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 이건 뭐야……?
　필립포 비장의 소재 메모장……?
　이건 필요 없겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1591.zh-Hans:
<voice 02232_00001591><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>这是什么玩意……
皮利珀秘传的笑料集？
这种东西我才不需要呢。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1591.zh-Hant:
<voice 02232_00001591><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>這是什麼玩意……
皮利珀祕傳的笑料集……？
這種東西我才不需要呢。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1592.en:
Pirippo's Secret Joke Book
was thrown away!
1592.ja:
なんと　ピリッポ秘伝のネタ帖を
捨てられてしまった！
1592.ko:
이럴 수가! 필립포 비장의 소재 메모장은
버려지고 말았다!
1592.zh-Hans:
皮利珀秘传的笑料集
被扔掉了！
1592.zh-Hant:
皮利珀祕傳的笑料集
被扔掉了！

1593.en: <voice 02601_00001593><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Ho-ho. You've got a Zoomstone, too!<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1593.ja: <voice 02601_00001593><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ほほう。ルーラストーンも持ってるのか！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1593.ko: <voice 02601_00001593><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 오오, 루라 스톤까지 갖고 있잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1593.zh-Hans: <voice 02601_00001593><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>哦哦。原来还有鲁拉之石！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1593.zh-Hant: <voice 02601_00001593><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>喔喔，原來還有魯拉石！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1594.ja:
なんと　<cs_pchero>は
ルーラストーンを　うばわれた！

1595.en:
<voice 02685_00001595><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I see, I see. Seems like they
were planning to make a name for
themself in the town of Orphea.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1595.ja:
<voice 02685_00001595><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「そうかそうか。きっと　オルフェアの町で
　名を上げるつもりだったんだね。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1595.ko:
<voice 02685_00001595><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 그렇군, 보아하니 오르페어 마을에서
　이름을 알릴 생각이었던 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1595.zh-Hans:
<voice 02685_00001595><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>啊，原来如此。
这人肯定是打算在欧鲁非亚镇扬名吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1595.zh-Hant:
<voice 02685_00001595><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>啊，原來如此。
這人肯定是打算在歐菲亞鎮揚名吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1596.en:
<voice 02762_00001596><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>To die in a place like this...
What a shame. But don't worry.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1596.ja:
<voice 02762_00001596><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「それが　こんな所で死んじまって……
　さぞや無念だろう。でも　安心しなさい。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1596.ko:
<voice 02762_00001596><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 그런데 이런 데서 죽다니……
　참으로 원통하겠군. 그래도 걱정 마.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1596.zh-Hans:
<voice 02762_00001596><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>居然就在这种地方死去了……
肯定心存不甘吧。不过，请安心吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1596.zh-Hant:
<voice 02762_00001596><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>居然就在這種地方死去了……
肯定心存不甘吧。不過，請安心吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1597.en:
<voice 02890_00001597><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I'll use the money and the
Zoomstone on your behalf.
So don't haunt me, okay?<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1597.ja:
<voice 02890_00001597><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「お金と　ルーラストーンは
　あんたの分まで　あたしが使ってあげる。
　だから　化けてでるんじゃないよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1597.ko:
<voice 02890_00001597><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 돈과 루라 스톤은
　내가 그쪽 몫까지 써줄 테니까.
　그러니 귀신이 돼서 나타나진 마.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1597.zh-Hans:
<voice 02890_00001597><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>钱和鲁拉之石我会替你好好使用的。
所以你千万别诈尸啊。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1597.zh-Hant:
<voice 02890_00001597><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>錢和魯拉石
我會替你好好使用的。
你可別死不瞑目出來嚇人啊。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1598.en:
<voice 02975_00001598><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>You must be from Pukulet Village.
I'll return you to your hometown.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1598.ja:
<voice 02975_00001598><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「きっと　プクレットの村の人だろう。
　あたしが　あんたを
　故郷に　連れて帰ってあげるよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1598.ko:
<voice 02975_00001598><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 아마 푸크레트 마을 사람이겠지.
　내가 댁을 고향까지 데려다줄게.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1598.zh-Hans:
<voice 02975_00001598><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你一定是普库莱特村的人吧。
我把你带回故乡吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1598.zh-Hant:
<voice 02975_00001598><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>你一定是
普庫萊特村的人吧。
我會帶著你回到故鄉的。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1599.en:
<voice 00025_00001599><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Whoa! Looks like you made it back
safe and sound. So how'd it go?
Did you beat that freak?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1599.ja:
<voice 00025_00001599><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「おっ！　無事に　お帰りみたいだな。
　どうだった？　へたれの大ちゃんは倒せたのか？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1599.ko:
<voice 00025_00001599><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 오! 무사히 돌아왔구나.
　그래서? 부뎡한 이무기는 해치웠어?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1599.zh-Hans:
<voice 00025_00001599><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>哦！你平安回来了。
怎么样？打倒笨蛋大蛇蛇了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1599.zh-Hant:
<voice 00025_00001599><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>喔！你平安回來了。
怎麼樣？打倒笨蛋大蛇蛇了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1600.en:
...Great! That's great! Pudin has the right to be the first to hear about how the battle ended.
I'll wait til you've told him first.
1600.ja:
<voice 00055_00001600><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……っと　いい！　いい！
　戦いの結末を　最初に聞く権利は
　プディンにある。オレは　その後でいいよ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1600.ko:
<voice 00055_00001600><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……아, 아니다! 됐어!
　이 싸움의 결말을 제일 먼저 들어야 할
　사람은 푸딩이니까. 난 나중에 들을게.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1600.zh-Hans:
<voice 00055_00001600><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……算了！算了！
有权利第一个听你汇报战果的是布丁。
你之后再告诉我就好了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1600.zh-Hant:
<voice 00055_00001600><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……算了！算了！
有權利第一個聽你說明戰果的是布汀。
你之後再告訴我就好了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1601.en:
<voice 00110_00001601><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Right. If you're looking for Pudin, the
merchant Tiltzkin just called for him,
so he went to the sage Eidos's lair.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1601.ja:
<voice 00110_00001601><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「そうそう。プディンなら　さっき
　商人のティルツキンさんが　呼びにきて
　賢者エイドスのほこらへ　出かけたぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1601.ko:
<voice 00110_00001601><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 참, 푸딩은 아까
　상인인 틸츠킨 씨가 데리러 와서
　현자 에이도스의 성소에 갔어.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1601.zh-Hans:
<voice 00110_00001601><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>对了。布丁刚才
被商人提尔茨津叫走，
前往贤者艾伊德斯的祠堂了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1601.zh-Hant:
<voice 00110_00001601><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>對了。布汀剛才
被商人提爾茲金叫走，
前往賢者艾伊德斯的祠堂了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1602.en:
<voice 00140_00001602><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>You should go after him and tell him that
you're okay, alright, <pc>?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1602.ja:
<voice 00140_00001602><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「お前も　ふたりを追いかけて
　プディンに　ちゃんと元気に帰ったって
　教えてやれよ。なっ！　<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1602.ko:
<voice 00140_00001602><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 빨리 두 사람을 쫓아가서
　푸딩한테 무사히 돌아왔다고 알려줘.
　알았지? <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1602.zh-Hans:
<voice 00140_00001602><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你快去追他们俩人，
告诉布丁你平安归来了。
去吧！<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1602.zh-Hant:
<voice 00140_00001602><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>你快去追他們兩人，
告訴布汀你平安歸來了。
知道嗎！<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1603.en:
<voice 00050_00001603><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I told you to take a wagon out to
Defiled Valley to see if any travellers
had wandered in, and to help them if you found any.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1603.ja:
<voice 00050_00001603><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「そもそも　わしが命じたのは　けがれの谷へ
　迷い込む旅人がいないか　馬車で見回り
　もしもの時は　助けてやれ……ということ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1603.ko:
<voice 00050_00001603><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 애초에 내가 내린 명령은 마차로 순찰하며
　부정의 계곡에서 헤매는 여행자가 없는지
　살피고 여차할 때는 도와줄 것……이었다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1603.zh-Hans:
<voice 00050_00001603><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>我的命令是让你乘坐马车去巡视
有没有旅行者迷路误入污秽之谷，
如果有什么万一就去救助他们……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1603.zh-Hant:
<voice 00050_00001603><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>我的命令是讓你乘坐馬車去巡視
有沒有旅行者迷路誤入汙穢之谷，
如果有什麼萬一就去救助他們……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1604.en:
<voice 00095_00001604><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>That's why I put a spell on the
wagon to ward off monsters!!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1604.ja:
<voice 00095_00001604><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「馬車に　魔物よけの　まじないを
　ほどこしてやったのも　そのためだぞ！？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1604.ko:
<voice 00095_00001604><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 마차에 마물을 쫓는 주술을
　걸어준 것도 그 이유 아니었더냐!?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1604.zh-Hans:
<voice 00095_00001604><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>给马车施了驱魔术
也是为此！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1604.zh-Hant:
<voice 00095_00001604><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>所以才會為馬車
施加驅魔術啊！？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1605.en: <voice 00180_00001605><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Sob... I'm so, so sorry.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1605.ja: <voice 00180_00001605><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「うっうっ……ごめんなさいってば。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1605.ko: <voice 00180_00001605><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 으으…… 정말 잘못했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1605.zh-Hans: <voice 00180_00001605><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>呜呜呜……对不起啦。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1605.zh-Hant: <voice 00180_00001605><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>嗚嗚嗚……對不起啦。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1606.en:
<voice 00330_00001606><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Hmm. A Zoomstone, huh?
No, not just that. You spent
all their money too, didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1606.ja:
<voice 00330_00001606><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。ルーラストーンか。
　それだけでは　あるまい。
　カネは　使い込んだのだな。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1606.ko:
<voice 00330_00001606><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 루라 스톤이라.
　그것만이 아닐 텐데.
　돈은 이미 다 쓴 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1606.zh-Hans:
<voice 00330_00001606><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……唉，拿了鲁拉之石啊。
不仅如此，
钱也已经花光了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1606.zh-Hant:
<voice 00330_00001606><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……嗯，魯拉石啊。
應該不只有這樣，
錢是花光了吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1607.en:
<voice 00414_00001607><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>That's a sage for you!
You're so good at figuring things out.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1607.ja:
<voice 00414_00001607><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「さすがは　賢者さま！
　よく　おわかりでございますねえ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1607.ko:
<voice 00414_00001607><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 역시 현자님이십니다!
　전부 꿰뚫어 보시는군요.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1607.zh-Hans:
<voice 00414_00001607><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>不愧是贤者大人！
真是无所不知。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1607.zh-Hant:
<voice 00414_00001607><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>不愧是賢者大人！
真是無所不知。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1608.en: <voice 00522_00001608><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...There you have it, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1608.ja: <voice 00522_00001608><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「…………と　いうわけだ　<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1608.zh-Hans: <voice 00522_00001608><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>…………就是这么一回事，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1608.zh-Hant: <voice 00522_00001608><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>…………就是這麼一回事，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1610.en:
<voice 00740_00001610><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I'm deeply sorry for my
no-good helper's rudeness.
Here's your Zoomstone back.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1610.ja:
<voice 00740_00001610><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「不肖の弟子の無礼　まことに申し訳ない。
　さあ　これが　お前のルーラストーンだ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1610.ko:
<voice 00740_00001610><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 못난 제자의 결례를 사과하마.
　자, 이게 네 루라 스톤이다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1610.zh-Hans:
<voice 00740_00001610><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>我这不孝的弟子真是太对不起你了。
给，这就是你的鲁拉之石。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1610.zh-Hant:
<voice 00740_00001610><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>我這不肖弟子真是太對不起你了。
來，這就是你的魯拉石。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001533.ja:
<pc>は　ルーラストーンを
返してもらった！<me 61>

1612.en:
<pc> gave the Zoomstone
they'd borrowed back to Pudin!
1612.ja:
<pc>は　借りていたルーラストーンを
プディンに　返した！
1612.zh-Hans:
<pc>把借来的鲁拉之石
还给了布丁！
1612.zh-Hant:
<pc>將借來的魯拉石
還給了布汀！

1613.en:
<voice 00860_00001613><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...I see. When <pc> was about to die
a second time, that white light
scared the Toxic Viper away...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1613.ja:
<voice 00860_00001613><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「………そうか。<pc>が
　ふたたび　命を落としそうになったとき
　白き光が　けがれの大蛇をしりぞけたか……。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1613.ko:
<voice 00860_00001613><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ………그래, {pc}|hpp(이,가)
　다시 한번 죽음의 위기에 처하자
　하얀 빛이 부정한 이무기를 몰아냈단 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1613.zh-Hans:
<voice 00860_00001613><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>…………这样啊。
<pc>险些再次失去性命时，
一道白光击退了污秽大蛇……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1613.zh-Hant:
<voice 00860_00001613><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>…………這樣啊。
<pc>險些再次失去性命時，
一道白光擊退了汙穢的大蛇……<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1614.en:
<voice 00977_00001614><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>I saw it, too... A white light
stretching out from behind a
far-off mountain and filling the sky<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1614.ja:
<voice 00977_00001614><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ボクも見たよ……。
　遠くの山の向こうから　真っ白い光が伸びて
　空いっぱいに　広がったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1614.ko:
<voice 00977_00001614><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 저도 봤어요…….
　먼 산 너머에서 새하얀 빛이 뻗어 나오더니
　하늘을 가득 메웠어요.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1614.zh-Hans:
<voice 00977_00001614><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我也看到了……
在遥远的山的对面有一道白光射过来，
照亮了整个天空。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1614.zh-Hant:
<voice 00977_00001614><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我也看到了……
在遙遠的山的對面有一道白光射過來，
照亮了整個天空。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1615.en:
<voice 01075_00001615><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I knew it...
It seems my theory was correct.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1615.ja:
<voice 01075_00001615><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「やはりな……。
　わしの目に　狂いは　なかったようじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1615.ko:
<voice 01075_00001615><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 역시…….
　내 눈이 정확했던 것 같군.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1615.zh-Hans:
<voice 01075_00001615><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>果然……
我没有看错。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1615.zh-Hant:
<voice 01075_00001615><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>果然……
看來我並沒有看錯。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1616.en:
<voice 01213_00001616><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>The white light is a sign that the
legendary Hero has awakened...
It came from the distant land of Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1616.ja:
<voice 01213_00001616><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「白き光は　伝説の勇者が覚醒した証……。
　遠き　レンダーシアより放たれしもの。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1616.ko:
<voice 01213_00001616><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 하얀 빛은 전설의 용사가 각성했다는 증거…….
　머나먼 렌더시아에서 뿜어져 나온 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1616.zh-Hans:
<voice 01213_00001616><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>那道白光是传说中的勇者觉醒的证明……
是从遥远的冷达西亚传来的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1616.zh-Hant:
<voice 01213_00001616><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>那道白光是傳說中的勇者覺醒的證明……
是從遙遠的冷達西亞傳來的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1617.en:
<voice 01223_00001617><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>, you have a
destiny to fulfill. That is why you
have escaped your doom.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1617.ja:
<voice 01223_00001617><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「<pc>　お前には　宿命がある。
　だからこそ　死すべき運命より逃れたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1617.ko:
<voice 01223_00001617><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 네게는 숙명이 있다.
　그렇기에 죽음의 운명에서 벗어난 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1617.zh-Hans:
<voice 01223_00001617><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>，你的身上背负着宿命。
所以才能够死里逃生。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1617.zh-Hant:
<voice 01223_00001617><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>，你身上背負著宿命。
所以才能夠死裡逃生。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1620.en:
<voice 01428_00001620><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I'm guessing you already know
what you really are, right? Your body
and soul are entirely separate.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1620.ja:
<voice 01428_00001620><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「自分でも　わかっているのだろう？
　お前の肉体と魂は　別の物だと。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1620.ko:
<voice 01428_00001620><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 너도 알고 있겠지?
　네 육체와 혼은 별개의 것이란 걸.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1620.zh-Hans:
<voice 01428_00001620><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你自己也很清楚吧？
你的肉体和灵魂不是一体的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1620.zh-Hant:
<voice 01428_00001620><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你自己也很清楚吧？
你的肉體和靈魂不是一體的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1621.en:
<voice 01892_00001621><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Well, I don't fully
understand it yet myself.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1621.ja: <voice 01892_00001621><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……まだ　くわしいことは　わからぬが。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1621.ko: <voice 01892_00001621><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……아직 자세한 건 모르겠다만.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1621.zh-Hans: <voice 01892_00001621><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……虽然详细的事情我还不大清楚。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1621.zh-Hant: <voice 01892_00001621><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……雖然詳細的事情我還不大清楚。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001471.en:
<voice 01978_19001471><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>The fact that your soul has entered
the body of another who has
passed on means that you have a role to play yet.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001471.ja:
<voice 01978_19001471><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「死んだ者の肉体に　お前の魂が　入り込み
　生き返ったということは　お前に　まだ
　なんらかの役目がある　という事だろう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001471.ko:
<voice 01978_19001471><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 죽은 자의 몸에 네 영혼이 들어와
　되살아난 것을 보면 네게는 아직
　완수해야 할 사명이 있다는 뜻이겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001471.zh-Hans:
<voice 01978_19001471><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>既然你的灵魂会进入死者的肉体，
进而起死回生，或许就代表
你还背负着什么使命吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001471.zh-Hant:
<voice 01978_19001471><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>既然你的靈魂會進入死者的肉體，
進而起死回生，或許就代表
你還背負著什麼使命吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1623.en:
<voice 02130_00001623><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>Then...the <pc> who cheered me up...
got killed by the Toxic Viper, huh...?<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1623.ja:
<voice 02130_00001623><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「じゃあ……ボクを　元気づけてくれた
　あの　<pc>さんは……
　けがれの大蛇に　殺されたんだね……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1623.ko:
<voice 02130_00001623><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 그럼…… 날 위로해 줬던
　<pc> 씨는……
　부정한 이무기에게 죽은 거구나…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1623.zh-Hans:
<voice 02130_00001623><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>这么说……帮我打起精神的
那个<pc>……
已经被污秽大蛇杀死了么……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1623.zh-Hant:
<voice 02130_00001623><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>這麼說……幫我打起精神的
那個<pc>……
已經被汙穢的大蛇殺死了吧……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

6786.en:
<voice 02213_00006786><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>But it's only because of
that that this <pc> was
able to come back to life, right?<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6786.ja:
<voice 02213_00006786><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「ま　こうやって　中の人が変わって
　ケロっと　生き返ってますけどね。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6786.ko:
<voice 02213_00006786><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 이렇게 안의 사람이 바뀌어서
　뿅 하고 되살아났지만요.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6786.zh-Hans:
<voice 02213_00006786><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>就像这样，里面的魂变了
然后死而复生吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
6786.zh-Hant:
<voice 02213_00006786><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>就像這樣，裡面的靈魂換個人，
輕輕鬆鬆復活了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1624.en:
<voice 02425_00001624><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>This body's master can no longer be
revived, but...if it wasn't for them, you
wouldn't have gotten a second shot at life.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1624.ja:
<voice 02425_00001624><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「もはや　この肉体の主は　よみがえらぬが
　……<pc>よ。お前は　やつのおかげで
　生き返り　こうして　ここにいる。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1624.ko:
<voice 02425_00001624><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 이 육체의 주인은 다시 돌아올 수 없겠지만
　……<pc>, 넌 그 녀석 덕분에
　되살아나 이렇게 여기 있는 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1624.zh-Hans:
<voice 02425_00001624><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>这具身躯的主人恐怕已经无法复苏了。
……<pc>啊。多亏了那个人，
你才能复活，站在这里。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1624.zh-Hant:
<voice 02425_00001624><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>這副身軀的主人已經無法復甦。
……<pc>啊。多虧了那個人，
你才能復活，站在這裡。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1625.en:
<voice 02544_00001625><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>At the very least, one day...you should
fulfill the dream they were shouldering.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1625.ja:
<voice 02544_00001625><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「せめて　いつか……
　こやつが背負っていた　夢を
　代わりに　かなえてやってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1625.ko:
<voice 02544_00001625><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 그러니 언젠가는……
　그 녀석이 이루지 못한 꿈을
　대신 이뤄다오.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1625.zh-Hans:
<voice 02544_00001625><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>至少，在今后的某日……
替那个人完成他曾经背负着的
梦想吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1625.zh-Hant:
<voice 02544_00001625><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>等哪天有機會……
至少替那個人完成他
曾經背負的夢想吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1626.ja: <voice 02665_00001626><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さんの…夢……。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1626.ko: <voice 02665_00001626><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨의… 꿈…….<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1627.en:
<voice 02736_00001627><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Now then! I'm leaving on a trip to find
out more about the Hero's awakening.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1627.ja:
<voice 02736_00001627><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……さて！
　わしは　勇者の覚醒について調べるため
　しばらく　旅に出るぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1627.ko:
<voice 02736_00001627><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……그럼
　난 용사의 각성에 대해 조사하기 위해
　잠시 여행을 떠나마.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1627.zh-Hans:
<voice 02736_00001627><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……好了！
我会外出旅行一段时间，
调查关于勇者觉醒的事情。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1627.zh-Hant:
<voice 02736_00001627><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……好了！
我會外出旅行一段時間，
調查關於勇者覺醒的事情。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1634.en:
<voice 03556_00001634><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Oh, right. The people from Pukulet
Village may still come back to play
tricks on me. I'll just have to leave a double here, then.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1634.ja:
<voice 03556_00001634><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……そうだな。プクレットの村の連中が
　また　いたずらしに来るかもしれん。
　身代わりを　置いていくことにしよう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1634.ko:
<voice 03556_00001634><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……그렇지, 푸크레트 마을 녀석들이
　또 장난을 치러 올 수도 있으니
　분신을 두고 가는 게 좋겠군.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1634.zh-Hans:
<voice 03556_00001634><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……对了。普库莱特村的村民
或许又会来捣蛋。
还是放个替身好了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1634.zh-Hant:
<voice 03556_00001634><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……對了。普庫萊特村的村民
或許又會來搗蛋。
還是放個替身好了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1635.en: <voice 03711_00001635><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Mm-hmm. That'll do.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1635.ja: <voice 03711_00001635><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「うむ。これでよし。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1635.ko: <voice 03711_00001635><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 이 정도면 되겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1635.zh-Hans: <voice 03711_00001635><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>嗯，这样就行了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1635.zh-Hant: <voice 03711_00001635><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>嗯，這樣就行了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1636.en:
<voice 03901_00001636><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...One last thing.
I'll make a prediction.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1636.ja: <voice 03901_00001636><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……最後に。予言をしてやろう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1636.ko: <voice 03901_00001636><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……마지막으로 예언을 하나 해 주마.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1636.zh-Hans: <voice 03901_00001636><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……最后，让我为你预言吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1636.zh-Hant: <voice 03901_00001636><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……最後，讓我為你預言吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1638.en:
<voice 03991_00001638><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>.
You will eventually be guided by fate to learn
why you have come back to life.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1638.ja:
<voice 03991_00001638><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「<pc>よ。
　お前は　いずれ　宿命に導かれるままに
　なにゆえ　自分が生き返ったのかを知るだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1638.ko:
<voice 03991_00001638><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: <pc>,
　넌 언젠가 네 숙명에 이끌려
　네가 되살아난 이유를 알게 될 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1638.zh-Hans:
<voice 03991_00001638><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
你总有一天会被宿命所指引，
了解到自己是为何而复活的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1638.zh-Hant:
<voice 03991_00001638><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>啊，
你總有一天會被宿命所指引，
瞭解到自己是為何而復活的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1639.en:
First, you must travel to all five continents. Follow your heart. Fate will catch up with you eventually.
Like it or not, it's inescapable.
1639.ja:
<voice 04075_00001639><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「まずは　５つの大陸を旅してみるといい。
　心のまま歩め。いずれ　宿命がお前を捕まえる。
　いやだと言っても　逃れることはできんぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1639.ko:
<voice 04075_00001639><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 우선 다섯 대륙을 여행해 보거라. 마음이 가는
　대로 가면 된다. 언젠가 숙명이 찾아올 테니.
　벗어나려 한들 도망칠 수 없을 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1639.zh-Hans:
<voice 04075_00001639><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>先去五大陆旅行吧，
你只要随性而行就好。无论你是否愿意，
终究逃不过自己背负的命运。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1639.zh-Hant:
<voice 04075_00001639><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你先去５大陸旅行吧。
只要隨性而行就好。無論你是否願意，
總有一天都將會迎來自己所背負的命運。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000863.en:
<voice 04076_19000863><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>. With that train pass as an
apology, please forgive my idiot helper.
Well, I'm setting off...<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000863.ja:
<voice 04076_19000863><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……この予言に免じて　あほうな
　不肖の弟子のことを　許してやってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000863.ko:
<voice 04076_19000863><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……이렇게 예언까지 했으니
　어리석고 못난 제자를 용서해 다오.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000863.zh-Hans:
<voice 04076_19000863><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……看在这预言的份上，
还请原谅我这不肖弟子。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000863.zh-Hant:
<voice 04076_19000863><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……看在這預言的份上，
還請原諒我這不肖弟子。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1640.en:
<voice 04201_00001640><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Luck be with you!
We'll meet again someday.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1640.ja:
<voice 04201_00001640><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「では　達者でな！　<pc>。
　いつの日か　ふたたび
　我らは　めぐり会うだろう！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1640.ko:
<voice 04201_00001640><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 그럼 잘 지내거라! <pc>.
　우리는 언젠가
　다시 만나게 될 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1640.zh-Hans:
<voice 04201_00001640><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>，祝你好运！
总有一天
我们会再相遇吧！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1640.zh-Hant:
<voice 04201_00001640><start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001><pc>，祝你好運！
總有一天
我們會再相遇吧！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1641.en: <voice 04538_00001641><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Master...so you're leaving, too.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1641.ja: <voice 04538_00001641><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「お師匠さま……行っちゃいましたね。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1641.ko: <voice 04538_00001641><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 스승님…… 떠나셨네요.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1641.zh-Hans: <voice 04538_00001641><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>师父……走掉了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1641.zh-Hant: <voice 04538_00001641><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>師父……走掉了呢。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1642.en:
<voice 04616_00001642><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Frankly, I had no idea what he
was talking about...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1642.ja:
<voice 04616_00001642><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「エイドスさまの話は　むずかしくて
　よくわからなかったんですが……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1642.ko:
<voice 04616_00001642><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 에이도스 님의 이야기는 너무 어려워서
　제대로 이해하지는 못 했지만……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1642.zh-Hans:
<voice 04616_00001642><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>艾伊德斯大人的话太复杂了，
我没太听懂，但是……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1642.zh-Hant:
<voice 04616_00001642><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>艾伊德斯大人的話太複雜了，
我聽得不是很懂，但是……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1643.en:
<voice 04676_00001643><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>At any rate, it seems like my patrols
in Defiled Valley are no longer needed,
so I think I'll go to Orphea.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1643.ja:
<voice 04676_00001643><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「とりあえず　けがれの谷の見回りは
　もう　いらないみたいですから
　あたしは　オルフェアの町へ行こうと思います。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1643.ko:
<voice 04676_00001643><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 아무튼 부정의 계곡 순찰은
　이제 필요 없을 것 같으니
　전 이만 오르페어 마을로 갈까 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1643.zh-Hans:
<voice 04676_00001643><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>总之我好像已经不需要
再在污秽之谷巡视了吧。
我决定去欧鲁非亚镇看看。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1643.zh-Hant:
<voice 04676_00001643><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>總之好像已經不需要
繼續在汙穢之谷巡視了，
所以我打算去歐菲亞鎮看看。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1644.en:
<voice 04756_00001644><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I'll restart my business there, no
fooling around. I'm truly sorry for all
the trouble I've caused you, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1644.ja:
<voice 04756_00001644><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あっちで　まじめに　商売をやり直しますよ。
　<pc>さん　本当に
　ご迷惑を　おかけしました。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1644.ko:
<voice 04756_00001644><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 그쪽에서 다시 성실하게 장사를 하려고요.
　<pc> 씨, 정말
　여러모로 죄송했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1644.zh-Hans:
<voice 04756_00001644><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>我要在那里开始认真做生意。
这次真的是
给<pc>你添麻烦了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1644.zh-Hant:
<voice 04756_00001644><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>我要在那裡認真地重新開始做生意。
這次真的是
給<pc>你添麻煩了。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1645.en:
<voice 04846_00001645><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I'll take Pudin back to Pukulet
Village, so you don't have to worry
about him. Come on, Pudin. Let's go.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1645.ja:
<voice 04846_00001645><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「プディンさんは　あたしの馬車で
　プクレットの村まで　送っていきますんで
　ご心配なく。さ　プディンさん。行きましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1645.ko:
<voice 04846_00001645><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>: 푸딩 씨는 제가 마차로 푸크레트 마을까지
　데려다드릴 테니 걱정 마십시오.
　자 푸딩 씨, 가죠.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1645.zh-Hans:
<voice 04846_00001645><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>我会用马车将布丁送回普库莱特村的，
请不用担心。
布丁，我们走吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1645.zh-Hant:
<voice 04846_00001645><start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>我會用我的馬車將布汀送回普庫萊特村的，
請不用擔心。
布汀，我們走吧。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1646.en:
<voice 05046_00001646><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>...<pc> said that someday they'd
make it to Lendersia, the center of the
world, and master the art of comedy!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1646.ja:
<voice 05046_00001646><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「……<pc>さんは　いずれ
　世界の中心　レンダーシアに渡って
　最高の面白演技を極めるんだ！　って言ってた。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1646.ko:
<voice 05046_00001646><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: ……<pc> 씨는 언젠가
　세계의 중심인 렌더시아로 가서
　최고의 개그 연기를 마스터하겠다고 했어.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1646.zh-Hans:
<voice 05046_00001646><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……<pc>说过自己总有一天
会去世界中心冷达西亚，
展示最棒的表演！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1646.zh-Hant:
<voice 05046_00001646><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>……<pc>說過自己總有一天
會去世界中心冷達西亞，
展現最棒的表演！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1647.en:
<voice 05110_00001647><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>They told me it was their dream...
I'm going back to the village, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1647.ja:
<voice 05110_00001647><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「それが　自分の夢だって……。
　<pc>さん。
　ボク　先に　村に戻ってるね！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1647.ko:
<voice 05110_00001647><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 그게 자기의 꿈이라면서…….
　<pc> 씨.
　난 먼저 마을로 돌아갈게!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1647.zh-Hans:
<voice 05110_00001647><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>这就是<pc>的梦想……
我先回村子里了！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1647.zh-Hant:
<voice 05110_00001647><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>說是自己的夢想……
<pc>，
我先回村子囉！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1648.en:
<voice 00025_00001648><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>Yo, <pc>!
Did you get a chance to meet up with
Pudin?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1648.ja:
<voice 00025_00001648><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「よう！　<pc>。
　プディンとは　会えたのか？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1648.ko:
<voice 00025_00001648><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 이봐! <pc>.
　푸딩은 잘 만났어?<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1648.zh-Hans:
<voice 00025_00001648><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>哟！<pc>。
找到布丁了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1648.zh-Hant:
<voice 00025_00001648><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>嗨！<pc>。
見到布汀了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1649.en:

我很欣賞你的毅力！我很感動！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1676.en:
<voice 02283_00001676><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>I hear you got your Zoomstone
back, too! I'm sure Father Heppet
at the church will gladly teach you how to use it properly!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1676.ja:
<voice 02283_00001676><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「ルーラストーンも　取り戻したそうじゃな！
　くわしい使い方なら　教会のヘペット神父が
　教えてくれるはずじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1676.ko:
<voice 02283_00001676><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 듣자 하니 루라 스톤도 되찾았다지!?
　자세한 사용법은 교회에 있는
　헤페트 신부가 알려줄 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1676.zh-Hans:
<voice 02283_00001676><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>鲁拉之石也取回来了呢！
至于详细的使用方法，
教会的黑佩特神父会告诉你的！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1676.zh-Hant:
<voice 02283_00001676><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>魯拉石也取回來了！
至於詳細的使用方法，
教會的黑佩特神父會告訴你的！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9602.en:
<voice 02312_00009602><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>You won't have any regrets left in this
village. Now, take out your Adventure Log!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9602.ja:
<voice 02312_00009602><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「もはや　この村に心残りは　ないじゃろう。
　さあ　冒険の書を出すのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9602.ko:
<voice 02312_00009602><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 이제 우리 마을에 아쉬움이 남지 않겠지.
　자, 모험의 서를 꺼내 보거라!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9602.zh-Hans:
<voice 02312_00009602><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>这个村子没有什么好留恋的了。
来，拿出冒险之书吧！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9602.zh-Hant:
<voice 02312_00009602><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>你對這個村子已經沒有什麼留戀了吧。
好，那就拿出冒險之書吧！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1677.en:
<voice 02553_00001677><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>With this Mark of Adulthood,
the kings and ministers of any
country will surely meet with you.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1677.ja:
<voice 02553_00001677><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「この　一人前の証が　あれば
　いかなる国の　王や大臣も
　会ってくれるはずじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1677.ko:
<voice 02553_00001677><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 이 모험가의 증표가 있으면
　모든 나라의 왕과 대신을
　만날 수 있을 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1677.zh-Hans:
<voice 02553_00001677><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>只要有了这个合格者的证明，
各国的国王或者大臣
都会接见你的。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1677.zh-Hant:
<voice 02553_00001677><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>只要有了這個合格者之證，
各國的國王或者大臣
都會接見你的。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1678.en:
<voice 02562_00001678><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>On top of that, you're the funniest
Pukulipo in Goofball Grand Prix history.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1678.ja:
<voice 02562_00001678><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「その上　<pc>は
　演芸グランプリ史上最強の　面白プクリポ。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1678.ko:
<voice 02562_00001678><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 게다가 {pc}|hpp(은,는)
　연예 그랑프리 사상 가장 웃긴 푸크리포.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1678.zh-Hans:
<voice 02562_00001678><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>而且<pc>是演艺大奖赛史上
最强最有趣的普库里坡。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1678.zh-Hant:
<voice 02562_00001678><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>而且<pc>是演藝大賽史上
最強最有趣的普庫里坡。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1679.en:
I'm sure you'll bring laughter wherever you go. The town of Orphea, the kingdom of Megistris...
you'll bring smiles to the world.
1679.ja:
<voice 02572_00001679><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「きっと　行く先々で　皆を笑わし
　オルフェアの町や　メギストリス王国……
　そして世界中に　笑顔を運んでくれるじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1679.ko:
<voice 02572_00001679><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 필시 가는 곳마다 사람들에게 웃음을 선사해
　오르페어 마을과 메기스투리스 왕국……
　그리고 온 세상에 웃음을 퍼트릴 테지.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1679.zh-Hans:
<voice 02572_00001679><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>你所到之处肯定会充满大家的笑声，
不管是在欧鲁非亚镇还是麦奇斯翠丝王国，
你都能为整个世界带来笑声吧。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1679.zh-Hant:
<voice 02572_00001679><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>你所到之處肯定會充滿大家的笑聲，
不管是在歐菲亞鎮還是麥奇斯翠絲王國……
你都能為整個世界帶來笑容吧。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

27116.en:
If you travel the world and make an impact in various countries, you may be awarded a Key Emblem,
a medal in the shape of a key.
27116.ja:
<voice 02577_00027116><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「世界をめぐり　各国で活躍すれば 
　キーエンブレムという　カギの形をした
　勲章を　与えられることがある。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27116.ko:
<voice 02577_00027116><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 세상을 돌며 각국에서 활약하면
　키 엠블럼이라는 열쇠 모양의
　훈장을 받을 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27116.zh-Hans:
<voice 02577_00027116><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>只要能环游世界，活跃于各国之间，
就可能获得一种名叫键徽的
钥匙形状勋章。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
27116.zh-Hant:
<voice 02577_00027116><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>只要能環遊世界，活躍於各國之間，
就可能獲得一種名叫鑰徽的
鑰匙形狀勳章。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1680.en:
Pukuku... I'm imagining you doing a handstand in each country, covered in Key Emblems!
It makes me giddy just thinking about it.
1680.ja:
<voice 02582_00001680><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「ぷくく……各国で　手がらを立て
　キーエンブレムまみれになった　お前の姿を
　想像するだけで　うれしくなってくるわい！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1680.ko:
<voice 02582_00001680><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 푸크크…… 이곳저곳에서 공을 세워
　키 엠블럼으로 뒤덮인 네 모습을
　상상하기만 해도 흐뭇하구나!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1680.zh-Hans:
<voice 02582_00001680><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……光是想象着你在各国立功
赢得一大把键徽的样子，
我就感到很开心呢！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1680.zh-Hant:
<voice 02582_00001680><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……光是想像著你在各國立功，
贏得一大把鑰徽的模樣，
我就會很開心呢！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1681.ja: <voice 02682_00001681><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「ボクも……そう思う！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1681.ko: <voice 02682_00001681><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 나도…… 그렇게 생각해!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1681.zh-Hans: <voice 02682_00001681><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我也……这么觉得！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1681.zh-Hant: <voice 02682_00001681><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我也……這麼覺得！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1682.en:
<voice 02703_00001682><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001><pc>.
I'm also going to the town of Orphea,
where my relatives live.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1682.ja:
<voice 02703_00001682><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。
　ボクも　これから　しんせきのいる
　オルフェアの町へ行くんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1682.ko:
<voice 02703_00001682><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 나도 친척이 사는
　오르페어 마을로 갈 거야.<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1682.zh-Hans:
<voice 02703_00001682><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001><pc>。
我现在也要前往欧鲁非亚镇
去投奔亲戚了。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1682.zh-Hant:
<voice 02703_00001682><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001><pc>。
我現在也要前往歐菲亞鎮
去投奔親戚了。<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1683.en: <voice 02752_00001683><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>So that's why I, uhh...<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1683.ja: <voice 02752_00001683><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「だから　えっと……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1683.ko: <voice 02752_00001683><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 그러니까, 그……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1683.zh-Hans: <voice 02752_00001683><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>所以，所以……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1683.zh-Hant: <voice 02752_00001683><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>所以，那個……<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1684.en: <voice 02802_00001684><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>I'm heading out!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1684.ja: <voice 02802_00001684><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>「先　行ってるね！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1684.ko: <voice 02802_00001684><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>: 먼저 가 있을게!<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1684.zh-Hans: <voice 02802_00001684><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我先走了！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1684.zh-Hant: <voice 02802_00001684><start_lip_sync n00298 _normal m00001>我先走了！<stop_lip_animation n00298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1685.en:
Come on! The real adventure's just beginning! For now, run off to the west!
The world's waiting for you to make them laugh!
1685.ja:
<voice 02902_00001685><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「さあ！　本当の冒険は　これからじゃぞ！
　とりあえず　西に向かって走るのじゃ！
　世界が　お前の笑いを待っておる！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1685.ko:
<voice 02902_00001685><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 자! 진짜 모험은 이제부터다!
　우선 서쪽으로 가 보거라!
　세상이 네 개그를 기다리고 있다!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1685.zh-Hans:
<voice 02902_00001685><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>好啦！真正的冒险现在才要开始！
总之先向西去吧！
世界在等着你的幽默呢！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1685.zh-Hant:
<voice 02902_00001685><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>好啦！真正的冒險現在才要開始！
總之先朝著西邊奔跑吧！
世界在等著你的幽默呢！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1686.en:
<voice 02979_00001686><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>Farewell, <pc>...
My beloved disciple!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1686.ja:
<voice 02979_00001686><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「さらばだ　<pc>……。
　わが　最愛の弟子よ！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1686.ko:
<voice 02979_00001686><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 잘 가거라, <pc>…….
　내가 가장 아끼는 제자여!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1686.zh-Hans:
<voice 02979_00001686><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>再见了，<pc>……
我最爱的弟子！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1686.zh-Hant:
<voice 02979_00001686><start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>再見了，<pc>……
我最愛的弟子！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1688.en:
<voice 00265_00001688><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>We were just about to leave.
I'm taking Pudin to the town of Orphea.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1688.ja:
<voice 00265_00001688><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「ちょうど　オレたちも　これから
　村を出るところなんだ。
　プディンを　オルフェアの町まで送ってくのさ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1688.ko:
<voice 00265_00001688><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 마침 우리도 마을을 떠나려던 참이야.
　푸딩을 오르페어 마을까지 데려다주려고.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1688.zh-Hans:
<voice 00265_00001688><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>正好我们也要离开村子呢。
我要将布丁送到欧鲁非亚镇去。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1688.zh-Hant:
<voice 00265_00001688><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我們正好也要離開村子。
我要送布汀
到歐菲亞鎮。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1689.en:
<voice 00370_00001689><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>You know...
You're really something, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1689.ja:
<voice 00370_00001689><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「それにしても……
　<pc>　お前は　すごいよな。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1689.ko:
<voice 00370_00001689><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 그나저나……
　<pc>, 넌 진짜 대단한 녀석이야.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1689.zh-Hans:
<voice 00370_00001689><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>不过话说回来……
<pc>你可真厉害呢。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1689.zh-Hant:
<voice 00370_00001689><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>不過話說回來……
<pc>你可真厲害呢。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1690.en:
<voice 00400_00001690><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>You won the Goofball Grand Prix by a
landslide and drove out the Toxic Viper...
I could never compare.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1690.ja:
<voice 00400_00001690><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「演芸グランプリには　ぶっちぎりで優勝するわ
　けがれの大蛇は　追い払っちまうわ
　……ほんと　かないっこないぜ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1690.ko:
<voice 00400_00001690><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 연예 그랑프리에서 압승을 거두질 않나
　부정한 이무기를 몰아내질 않나
　……정말 못 당하겠다니까.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1690.zh-Hans:
<voice 00400_00001690><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>在演艺大奖赛上获胜，
还击退了污秽大蛇，
……真是服了你了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1690.zh-Hant:
<voice 00400_00001690><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>在演藝大賽上獲勝，
還擊退了汙穢的大蛇，
……真是服了你了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1691.en:
<voice 00445_00001691><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>...After watching you and Pudin,
I finally understood.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1691.ja:
<voice 00445_00001691><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「……プディンや　お前を見てて
　ようやく　ふんぎりがついたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1691.ko:
<voice 00445_00001691><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: ……푸딩과 널 보면서
　나도 겨우 결심이 섰어.<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1691.zh-Hans:
<voice 00445_00001691><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……看到布丁和你之后
我总算下定决心了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1691.zh-Hant:
<voice 00445_00001691><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>……看到布汀和你之後，
我總算下定決心了。<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1692.en:
<voice 00491_00001692><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>I'm not cut out for comedy.
From now on...<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1692.ja:
<voice 00491_00001692><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「オレには　お笑いは向いてない。
　これからは……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1692.ko:
<voice 00491_00001692><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 난 개그엔 소질이 없어.
　앞으로는……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1692.zh-Hans:
<voice 00491_00001692><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我不适合搞笑。
从今往后……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1692.zh-Hant:
<voice 00491_00001692><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我不適合搞笑。
今後……<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>

1693.en:
I'll be the first guy who can cry on command and move the world with my mad crying skills,
which I learned from Pudin!
1693.ja:
<voice 00521_00001693><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>「プディン直伝の　泣き芸で
　いつでも　どこでも　泣ける男として
　世界を　感動に包んでやるぜ！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1693.ko:
<voice 00521_00001693><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>: 푸딩에게 배운 통곡 스킬로
　언제 어디서든 울 수 있는 남자가 돼서
　세상에 감동을 줄 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1693.zh-Hans:
<voice 00521_00001693><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我要用从布丁身上学来的哭技
成为一名无论何时何地都能哭出来的男人，
让世界充满感动！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
1693.zh-Hant:
<voice 00521_00001693><start_lip_sync n00299 _normal m00001>我要用從布汀身上學來的哭技，
成為一名無論何時何地都能哭出來的男人，
讓世界充滿感動！<stop_lip_animation n00299 CLOSE_MOUTH>
